He falls in love with her and must win her over before she gets married.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect
programme.desc: College student Beca (Anna Kendrick) knows she does not want to be part of a clique, but that's exactly where she finds herself after arriving at her new school. Thrust in among mean gals, nice gals and just plain weird gals, Beca finds that the only thing they have in common is how well they sing together. She takes the women of the group out of their comfort zone of traditional arrangements and into a world of amazing harmonic combinations in a fight to the top of college music competitions.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 2
programme.desc: It's been three years since the Barden Bellas (Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson) became the first all-female group to win a national title. All seems well until a botched Lincoln Center performance for the president leads to a scandal that strips them of their performing duties, causing internal tension and strife. With the world championships on the horizon in Copenhagen, Denmark, the women must get their act together for their one and only shot at redemption.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: After the highs of winning the world championships, the Bellas find themselves split apart and discovering there aren't job prospects for making music with your mouth. programme.title: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Get Up
programme.desc: ESPN's morning show features host Mike Greenberg with a rotating and diverse group of analysts opining about and analyzing the latest news from the world of sports. The two-hour, personality-driven show originates from Manhattan's South Street Seaport, a locale that attracts high-profile guests. Greenberg, aka "Greeny," is formerly one-half of ESPN Radio's longtime "Mike & Mike" morning show.

programme.title: Live: First Take
programme.desc: Stephen A. Smith hosts this weekday morning sports debate show. Smith provides his expert takes on the day's trending sports topics and under-the-radar news. They're regularly joined by veteran analysts and the top guests in sports and entertainment.

programme.title: Live: The Pat McAfee Show
programme.desc: Former NFL punter Pat McAfee brings his humor and candor to the microphone to highlight the day's top stories.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: NBA Today
programme.desc: In-depth, comprehensive daily coverage of all aspects of the NBA from expert analysts.

programme.title: NFL Live
programme.desc: Host Laura Rutledge takes the helm of this weekday show featuring the likes of Marcus Spears, Dan Orlovsky, Mina Kimes, and Adam Schefter. The "NFL Live" crew entertains fans while offering all the latest news and analysis from across the NFL.

programme.title: Live: SportsCenter
programme.desc: The latest news, highlights and inside information from every corner of the sports world is presented each day on "SportsCenter," ESPN's first-ever program when the network debuted in September of 1979. The flagship series airs an evening edition and a brand new midnight show each weekday before the stage is cleared for a live "SportsCenter" morning block that emphasizes fast-paced, highlights-driven reports and what's new on social media platforms.

programme.title: Live: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. The pair engage in high-energy discussions, conduct interviews and often argue over topics not even related to sports. Other sports reporters appear as guests and offer opinions on the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Live: NBA Tip-Off
programme.desc: The latest episode of NBA Tip-Off.

programme.title: Live: NBA Courtside
programme.desc: An insight into upcoming National Basketball Association matches, highlighting the players to watch and the top team news.

programme.title: Live: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Cavaliers play the Knicks at Madison Square Garden. New York fired head coach Tom Thibodeau following the 2024-25 campaign despite a trip to the Eastern Conference finals. Cleveland won 64 games during its first season under Kenny Atkinson.

programme.title: Live: NBA Basketball
programme.desc: The Spurs and Mavericks kick off their 2025-26 campaigns with an all-Texas showdown. San Antonio star Victor Wembanyama returns to action after missing the final 30 games of the previous season due to deep vein thrombosis discovered in his shoulder.

programme.title: Live: Inside the NBA
programme.desc: This Emmy Award-winning studio show, which airs following NBA telecasts on ESPN, is hosted by Ernie Johnson, with analysis from Hall of Famer Charles Barkley and NBA champions Kenny Smith and Shaquille O'Neal. It's a mix of highlights, interviews and hijinks, notably the verbal sparring sessions between the outspoken Barkley and his straight man, Smith. The show also welcomes various guest analysts throughout the season.

programme.title: Brick Mansions
programme.desc: In a dystopian Detroit, grand houses that once housed the wealthy are now homes of the city's most-dangerous criminals. Surrounding the area is a giant wall to keep the rest of Detroit safe. For undercover cop Damien Collier (Paul Walker), every day is a battle against corruption as he struggles to bring his father's killer, Tremaine (RZA), to justice. Meanwhile, Damien and an ex-con named Lino (David Belle) work together to save the city from a plot to destroy it.

programme.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
programme.desc: Mick Haller (Matthew McConaughey) is a charismatic defense attorney who does business out of his Lincoln Continental sedan. Mick spends most of his time defending petty crooks and other bottom-feeders, so it comes as quite a surprise when he lands the case of a lifetime: defending a Beverly Hills playboy (Ryan Phillippe) who is accused of attempted murder. However, what Mick initially thinks is an open-and-shut case with a big monetary reward develops into something more sinister.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: Clyde Shelton is an honorable family man, until the day his wife and daughter are murdered in a home invasion. He hopes for justice, but a rising prosecutor named Nick Rice cuts a deal with one of the killers in exchange for testimony. Ten years later, that man is found dead.

programme.title: Swordfish
programme.desc: Behind the world's most sophisticated security systems, billions of illegal government funds lie. Gabriel Shear plans to finance his own brand of ruthless patriotism if he can break into this virtual Fort Knox. He needs parolee Stanley Jobson, the only man capable of penetrating the layers of firewalls and encrypted passwords. Now Shear and his partner Ginger use every lure, including the promise to reunite Jobson with his daughter, to obtain the greatest computer hack ever.

programme.title: Acts of Vengeance
programme.desc: A fast-talking lawyer transforms his body and takes a vow of silence, not to be broken until he finds out who killed his wife and daughter and has his revenge.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Threats against a blues singer (Bobby Short) coincide with the arrival in Sparta of his biggest fan, a wealthy heiress (Jean Simmons).

programme.title: Bait
programme.desc: Landing in jail for a petty theft crime, Alvin finds himself sharing a cell with John Jaster, the incarcerated half of the pair of high-tech thieves responsible for the missing gold. His partner, Bristol, is still at large. Alvin wants only to get out of prison and start fresh with his girlfriend, Lisa, and when the Feds, led by U.S. Treasury investigator Clenteen, set him loose on a sketchy deal, he thinks his luck has changed. Alvin has his freedom and the Feds have found their bait.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take -- small-time drug lords -- sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill --- for police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Exit Wounds
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as maverick Detroit police detective Orin Boyd, whose take-no-prisoners approach to domestic terrorism gets him booted downtown to the city's toughest precinct. Multi-Platinum hip hop star DMX stars as the powerful and mysterious crime lord Latrell Walker, whose dicey connections and seemingly unlimited cash make him everyone's target. Together the two men take on a conspiracy that reaches all the way through the ranks to the heart of the precinct.

programme.title: 2 Guns
programme.desc: For the past year, DEA agent Bobby Trench (Denzel Washington) and U.S. Navy intelligence officer Marcus Stigman (Mark Wahlberg) have been working under cover as members of a narcotics syndicate. The twist: Neither man knows that the other is an undercover agent. When their attempt to infiltrate a Mexican drug cartel and recover millions goes haywire, the men are disavowed by their superiors. Trench and Stigman must go on the run lest they wind up in jail or in a grave.

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: Once a first-rate Secret Service agent, Joe Hallenbeck (Bruce Willis) is now a gruff private investigator whose latest gig is protecting a pole dancer (Halle Berry). When she's murdered, he grudgingly teams up with her boyfriend, Jimmy Dix (Damon Wayans), an ex-quarterback with a gambling problem, and the two go after her killers. Before long, they stumble onto a plot by a well-known football magnate (Noble Willingham) to bribe federal legislators into legalizing sports gambling.

programme.title: The Bernie Mac Show

programme.title: Eve's Bayou
programme.desc: Over the course of a long, hot Louisiana summer, a 10-year-old black girl, Eve Batiste (Jurnee Smollett), discovers that her family's affluent existence is merely a facade. The philandering of her suave doctor father, Louis (Samuel L. Jackson), creates a rift, throwing Eve's mother, Roz (Lynn Whitfield), and teenage sister, Cisely (Meagan Good), into emotional turmoil. Eve, though, manages to find some solace with her quirky psychic aunt, Mozelle (Debbi Morgan).

programme.title: Fatale
programme.desc: After a wild one-night stand, a successful sports agent watches his perfect life slowly disappear when he discovers the sexy and mysterious woman he risked everything for is a determined police detective who entangles him in her latest investigation. As he tries desperately to put the pieces together, he falls deeper into her trap, risking his family, his career, and even his life.

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: Scott and Annie Russell couldn't be happier after buying their dream home from a mysterious and lonely widower named Charlie in Napa Valley, Calif. Their newfound paradise soon turns into a living nightmare when Charlie -- still strangely attached to the house -- begins to show up and interfere in their daily lives. When his erratic behavior turns to obsession, the young couple soon find themselves caught up in a violent confrontation that threatens to destroy everything they hold dear.

programme.title: Emergency Room Essen
programme.desc: Im größten Krankenhaus des Ruhrgebiets herrscht fast immer Ausnahmezustand. 24 Stunden täglich, an 365 Tagen im Jahr. Pausen gibt es für die Ärzte während ihrer langen Schichten kaum, auch weil immer häufiger Menschen mit kleinen Wehwehchen zu ihnen kommen. Sie wollen die Wartezeiten bei ihren Hausärzten umgehen. Die Folge: Mediziner und Pfleger sind am Limit.

programme.title: Emergency Room Essen
programme.desc: Wenn am Wochenende die Hausarztpraxen geschlossen sind, geht es hoch her in der Notaufnahme des Uniklinikums Essen. Patienten mit Verdacht auf Herzinfarkt, Schlaganfall oder andere lebensbedrohliche Krankheiten, werden sofort behandelt. Doch wer mit Husten, Schnupfen, Heiserkeit oder sonstigen Lappalien kommt, muss sich erstmal hintenanstellen. Wartezeit: manchmal über sieben Stunden.

programme.title: Eignungstest für Lebensretter
programme.desc: Dienst rund um die Uhr und die Bereitschaft, im Notfall die eigene Gesundheit zu riskieren. Feuerwehrmann zu sein ist ein knochenharter Job. Trotzdem bewerben sich Tausende jährlich um die Laufbahn des Lebensretters. Die Hürden sind hoch, viele scheitern an den Vorgaben. Wer es in die Vorauswahl geschafft hat, muss sich einem körperlichen Eignungstest unterziehen.

programme.title: Ein Lächeln für Manila
programme.desc: Es ist heiß im provisorischen Operationssaal in Manila, die Außentemperaturen liegen bei 40 Grad Celsius. Im Akkord werden gerade an drei Tischen Kinder gleichzeitig operiert. Seit 20 Jahren reist der plastische Chirurg Christopher Wachsmuth in seinem Jahresurlaub auf die Philippinen, um Kinder mit einer Lippen-Kiefer-Gaumenspalte zu operieren.

Deutschlands älteste Berufsfeuerwehr arbeitet am Limit. Besonders betroffen: der Stadtteil Neukölln. Mehr als 2000 Mal im Monat rücken hier die Retter vom Dienst aus. Die Menschen greifen immer schneller zum Hörer und wählen 112, auch wenn‘s nicht wirklich brennt. Die Arbeit im rauen Bezirk im Zentrum Berlins gilt als besonders fordernd und spannend und zieht deshalb vor allem Feuerwehrleute an.

Die Neuköllner Feuerwehrleute werden zu einem Motorrad-Unfall gerufen. Vor Ort wartet bereits eine Menschenmenge aus ebenso unbeteiligten, wie störenden Zuschauern. Gaffen aus Sensationslust und Respektlosigkeit gegenüber den Rettern ist in Neukölln ein wachsendes Problem. Stress ohne Ende - wenn die Arbeit der Feuerwehr zum Hindernislauf wird.

Ein selbstmordgefährdeter Mann, eine Wohnung unter Wasser und ein Mann mit Verfolgungswahn. Neukölln gehört zu Berlins ärmsten Bezirken. Die Auswirkungen beschäftigen auch die Männer von der Feuerwehr rund um die Uhr. In einem Fall müssen die Retter sogar mehrmals ausrücken: Ein Obdachloser will partout nicht ins Krankenhaus. Einsatz in Neukölln - wenn die Armut krankmacht.

Diesmal hält ein Wohnungsbrand in der Sonnenallee die Männer der Feuerwache Neukölln in Atem. Kaum angekommen, wird ihnen klar: Es sind noch Menschen in dem brennenden Haus. Die Wohnungen sind aber schwer zu erreichen. Jetzt wird allen alles abverlangt. Es bleibt jedoch nicht bei diesem Großeinsatz in ihrer Schicht.

Neun Autos stehen in einem Neuköllner Hinterhof in Flammen - ein Einsatz, auch für erfahrene Feuerwehrmänner nicht alltäglich. War es Brandstiftung? Eine andere Herausforderung für die Truppe ist der Notruf aus einer Laubenkolonie: Ein Mann mit Herzinfarkt. Es geht um Leben und Tod.

programme.title: Brennpunkt Berlin
programme.desc: Für die Polizisten in Berlin herrscht jede Nacht der Ausnahmezustand.

programme.title: Die Silberschmiede
programme.desc: Ein Besuch in der Besteck-Manufaktur Robbe & Berking.

programme.title: Edle Zeitmesser
programme.desc: In Hamburg hat sich eine kleine Manufaktur auf die Herstellung von außergewöhnlichen Chronometern spezialisiert.

programme.title: Glaskunst in Vollendung
programme.desc: Ein Blick hinter die Kulissen der modernen Glasproduktion und der alten Kunst der Glasbläserei.

programme.title: Einsatz für Christoph 29
programme.desc: Einsatz für Christoph 29 - Das Luftrettungszentrum Hamburg: Wenn der Alarm kommt, muss es schnell gehen. Rettungshubschrauber "Christoph 29" fliegt um die 2000 Einsätze pro Jahr. Der Helikopter gehört zum Bundeswehrkrankenhaus Hamburg. Doch die Mitarbeiter des dortigen Rettungszentrums müssen auch oft mit dem Notarztwagen ausrücken.

programme.title: Jede Sekunde zählt
programme.desc: Die Teams von Notärzten und Rettungsassistenten sind perfekt aufeinander eingespielt: Sie müssen schnell sein, effektiv handeln und die Lage vor Ort mit einem Blick erfassen. Wir haben die verantwortungsvolle und oft dramatische Arbeit von zwei Marburger Notarztteams mehrere Wochen lang beobachtet.

programme.title: Emergency Room Essen
programme.desc: Im größten Krankenhaus des Ruhrgebiets herrscht fast immer Ausnahmezustand. 24 Stunden täglich, an 365 Tagen im Jahr. Pausen gibt es für die Ärzte während ihrer langen Schichten kaum, auch weil immer häufiger Menschen mit kleinen Wehwehchen zu ihnen kommen. Sie wollen die Wartezeiten bei ihren Hausärzten umgehen. Die Folge: Mediziner und Pfleger sind am Limit.

programme.title: Welt der Zukunft
programme.desc: Schwebten 2010 noch weniger als 900 aktive Satelliten im Weltraum, so sind es heute fast 5000, und viele davon sind nur so groß wie ein Schuhkarton. Sogenannte "Satellitenschwärme" können uns mit wichtigen Daten versorgen - doch welche Gefahren bringen sie mit sich? Und wer wird den Kampf um die Vorherrschaft im All gewinnen?

programme.title: Welt der Zukunft
programme.desc: Auf der ganzen Welt zerbrechen sich Ingenieure und Wissenschaftler die Köpfe, um ein zentrales Problem zu lösen: Wie kann man Strom sicher und effizient in großem Maßstab und zu geringen Kosten speichern? Die Suche nach Antworten bringt einige wirklich bemerkenswerte Ideen hervor. Doch welche davon funktionieren auch in der Praxis?

programme.title: Welt der Zukunft
programme.desc: Das Baugewerbe ist für einen erschreckend hohen Prozentsatz des weltweiten Energieverbrauchs und der Treibhausgasemissionen verantwortlich und aktuell ist keine Trendwende in Sicht. Wie können wir in Zukunft umweltfreundlicher bauen und wohnen? Und welche Rolle könnten dabei Gebäude aus Holz spielen?

programme.title: Stephen Hawking: Reise durchs All
programme.desc: Das Universum ist scheinbar unendlich groß - und genauso verhielt es sich mit dem unstillbaren Wissensdurst von Stephen Hawking. Deshalb begibt sich der renommierte Physiker noch ein letztes Mal auf eine Reise, welche ihn zu den wichtigsten Stationen seiner Karriere und in die aufregendsten Ecken unseres Kosmos führt.

programme.title: Stephen Hawking: Reise durchs All
programme.desc: Als Physiker und Raumschiff-Kommandant unternimmt Stephen Hawking eine weitere Reise durch unser Universum. Diesmal verschlägt es ihn zur Venus, zur Sonne und bis hin zum mysteriösen Adlernebel - doch nicht immer verläuft dabei alles nach Flugplan. Die Suche nach der Weltformel und die Lösung des Fermi-Paradoxons stellen selbst für Hawking große Herausforderungen dar.

programme.title: Stephen Hawking: Reise durchs All
programme.desc: Stephen Hawking setzt seine Mission als Raumschiff-Kommandant fort. Er trifft dabei auf eine außerirdische KI und landet auf einer alternativen Erde. Die Suche nach der Weltformel bringt ihn sogar bis an den Rand des Universums. Dabei stellt Hawking auch die Frage, was darüber hinaus existiert und ob wir es nicht vielmehr mit einem "Multiversum" zu tun haben.

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: Despite having solid field training, CIA analyst Susan Cooper (Melissa McCarthy) has spent her entire career as a desk jockey, working hand-in-hand with dashing agent Bradley Fine (Jude Law). Using high-tech equipment and a hidden earpiece, Susan is the guardian angel who helps Bradley avoid danger. However, when Bradley is assassinated by Bulgarian arms dealer Rayna Boyanov (Rose Byrne), Susan wrangles her way into her first undercover assignment to help capture Boyanov and avenge Bradley.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: FBI Special Agent Sarah Ashburn (Sandra Bullock) is a methodical investigator with a long-standing reputation for excellence -- and arrogance. In contrast, foul-mouthed, hot-tempered detective Shannon Mullins (Melissa McCarthy) goes with her gut instincts and street smarts to remove criminals from the streets of Boston. Sparks fly when these polar opposites have to work together to capture a drug lord, but in the process, they become the last thing anyone expected -- buddies.

programme.title: There's Something About Mary
programme.desc: Ted's (Ben Stiller) dream prom date with Mary (Cameron Diaz) never happens due to an embarrassing injury at her home. Years later, Ted hires Pat Healy (Matt Dillon) to track down Mary so he can reconnect with her. Pat lies to Ted about Mary and he finds out everything he can about her to trick her into dating him. Ted travels to meet Mary and has to weave through the web of lies that Pat and Mary's friend Tucker (Lee Evans) have woven to try and win her over.

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: When a bank teller discovers he's actually a background player in an open-world video game, he decides to become the hero of his own story -- one that he can rewrite himself. In a world where there's no limits, he's determined to save the day his way before it's too late, and maybe find a little romance with the coder who conceived him.

programme.title: The Other Woman
programme.desc: New York lawyer Carly Whitten (Cameron Diaz) lives by strict rules when it comes to romantic relationships, but when she falls for suave, handsome Mark King (Nikolaj Coster-Waldau), she begins an affair with him. A surprise visit to Mark's home reveals that he is married to devoted housewife Kate (Leslie Mann). Carly and Kate direct their hurt and anger toward Mark, and when they discover yet a third woman (Kate Upton) caught in his web of lies, the three join forces for revenge.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Despite an amazing first date, Bea and Ben's initial attraction quickly turns sour. However, when they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, they pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: Anyone But You
programme.desc: Despite an amazing first date, Bea and Ben's initial attraction quickly turns sour. However, when they unexpectedly find themselves at a destination wedding in Australia, they pretend to be the perfect couple to keep up appearances.

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: Raised by his overprotective mother, Helen, Bobby Boucher Jr. is the water boy for a successful college football team coached by Red Beaulieu. When Beaulieu fires Bobby, he takes up the same position for a losing rival team, led by despairing Coach Klein. programme.title: According to Jim
programme.desc: Dana's new boyfriend (guest star Brad Paisley) is an amazing musician who can get Jim the gig of his dreams -- once Andy is out of the way.

programme.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
programme.desc: Convinced that mutants pose a threat to humanity, Dr. Bolivar Trask (Peter Dinklage) develops the Sentinels, enormous robotic weapons that can detect a mutant gene and zero in on that person. In the 21st century, the Sentinels have evolved into highly efficient killing machines. With mutants now facing extinction, Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) volunteers to go back in time and rally the X-Men of the past to help change a pivotal moment in history and thereby save their future.

programme.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
programme.desc: Seeking solace from his dark past, Logan (Hugh Jackman), better known as Wolverine, seems to have found love and contentment with Kayla Silverfox (Lynn Collins). Logan's peaceful existence is shattered when Victor Creed (Liev Schreiber), his vicious brother, brutally murders Kayla. Logan's thirst for revenge propels him into the Weapon X program, where he undergoes a painful procedure to bond his bones with adamantium, making him virtually indestructible and more than a match for Victor.

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Worshiped as a god since the dawn of civilization, the immortal Apocalypse (Oscar Isaac) becomes the first and most powerful mutant. Awakening after thousands of years, he recruits the disheartened Magneto (Michael Fassbender) and other mutants to create a new world order. As the fate of the Earth hangs in the balance, Professor X (James McAvoy) and Raven (Jennifer Lawrence) lead a team of young X-Men to stop their seemingly invincible nemesis from destroying mankind.

programme.title: The Wolverine
programme.desc: Lured to a Japan he hasn't seen since World War II, century-old mutant Wolverine (Hugh Jackman) finds himself in a shadowy realm of yakuza and samurai. Wolverine is pushed to his physical and emotional brink when he is forced to go on the run with a powerful industrialist's daughter (Tao Okamoto) and is confronted -- for the first time -- with the prospect of death. As he struggles to rediscover the hero within himself, he must grapple with powerful foes and the ghosts of his own haunted past.

programme.title: Deadpool
programme.desc: Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) is a former Special Forces operative who now works as a mercenary. His world comes crashing down when evil scientist Ajax (Ed Skrein) tortures, disfigures and transforms him into Deadpool. The rogue experiment leaves Deadpool with accelerated healing powers and a twisted sense of humor. With help from mutant allies Colossus and Negasonic Teenage Warhead (Brianna Hildebrand), Deadpool uses his new skills to hunt down the man who nearly destroyed his life.

programme.title: Independence Day: Resurgence
programme.desc: As the Fourth of July nears, satellite engineer David Levinson (Jeff Goldblum) investigates a 3,000-mile-wide mother ship that's approaching Earth. Fortunately, 20 years earlier, nations across the world started to use recovered extraterrestrial technology to develop an immense defense program. When the alien invaders attack with unprecedented force, the U.S. president, teams of scientists and brave fighter pilots spring into action to save the planet from a seemingly invincible enemy.

programme.title: Alien vs. Predator
programme.desc: When the wealthy and ambitious Charles Bishop Weyland (Lance Henriksen) funds an expedition to Antarctica, he hopes to find a mysterious source of heat that has been detected. Led by a tough guide, Alexa Woods (Sanaa Lathan), Weyland and his team uncover a pyramid, but they also find malevolent parasitic aliens. Making matters worse, another extraterrestrial species, known as Predators, arrive to hunt the other aliens, with the humans caught in the middle of the conflict.

programme.title: Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City policeman John McClane (Bruce Willis) is visiting his estranged wife (Bonnie Bedelia) and two daughters on Christmas Eve. He joins her at a holiday party in the headquarters of the Japanese-owned business she works for. But the festivities are interrupted by a group of terrorists who take over the exclusive high-rise, and everyone in it. Very soon McClane realizes that there's no one to save the hostages -- but him.

programme.title: Die Hard 2
programme.desc: A year after his heroics in L.A, detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is mixed up in another terrorist plot, this time at Washington Dulles International Airport, where he is waiting for his wife (Bonnie Bedelia). That same night, South American politico and drug profiteer Ramon Esperanza (Franco Nero) is arriving in U.S. custody. McClane takes action when a treasonous ex-colonel (William Sadler) seizes control of the airport, threatening to crash every inbound flight unless Esperanza is freed.

programme.title: Die Hard With a Vengeance
programme.desc: Detective John McClane (Bruce Willis) is now divorced, alcoholic and jobless after getting fired for his reckless behavior and bad attitude. He is called back into action, however, when a cryptic terrorist (Jeremy Irons) takes New York City hostage in a lethal game of "Simon Says" and refuses to speak with anyone but McClane. Teaming up with a street-savvy electrician named Zeus Carver (Samuel L. Jackson), McClane dashes through the city, trying to stay one step ahead of a murderous plot.

programme.title: Live Free or Die Hard
programme.desc: As the nation prepares to celebrate Independence Day, veteran cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) carries out another routine assignment: bringing in a computer hacker (Justin Long) for questioning. Meanwhile, a tech-savvy villain named Thomas Gabriel (Timothy Olyphant) launches an attack on America's computer infrastructure. As chaos descends around him, McClane must use old-fashioned methods to fight the high-tech threat.

programme.title: A Good Day to Die Hard
programme.desc: New York City cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) arrives in Moscow to track down his estranged son, Jack (Jai Courtney). McClane thinks his son is a criminal, so it comes as a shock when he learns that Jack is actually working undercover to protect Komarov (Sebastian Koch), a Russian government whistleblower. With their own lives on the line, McClane and Jack must overcome their differences in order to get Komarov to safety and thwart a potentially disastrous crime in the Chernobyl region.

programme.title: National Treasure
programme.desc: Historian and code-breaker Ben Gates (Nicolas Cage) has been searching his whole life for a rumored treasure dating back to the creation of the United States. Joining an expedition led by fellow treasure hunter Ian Howe (Sean Bean), Gates finds an ice-locked Colonial ship in the Arctic Circle that contains a clue linking the treasure to the Declaration of Independence. But when Howe betrays him, Gates has to race to get to the document ahead of his so-called colleague.

programme.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets
programme.desc: When a long-missing page from the diary of assassin John Wilkes Booth suddenly resurfaces, it implicates the great-great grandfather of treasure hunter Ben Gates (Nicolas Cage) as a conspirator in Lincoln's death. Ben's globetrotting quest to prove his ancestor's innocence leads him to a closely guarded book containing the nation's deepest secrets.

programme.title: Kim Jong Un: The Secret World of North Korea
programme.desc: A look at the leadership of Kim Jong Un and North Korea's secretive history, with exclusive interviews with political and historical experts Prof. Natasha Lindstaedt and Dr. Owen Miller.

programme.title: Cult of Personality
programme.desc: Warren Jeffs led the FLDS polygamist sect with total control over marriages until 2006, when he was placed on the FBI's Most Wanted List for arranging illegal underage marriages.

programme.title: CENSORED! Losing Our First Freedoms
programme.desc: Big Tech, the left and anti-American global forces are working to crush open discussion, honest debate and truth in America.

programme.title: I Killed John Lennon
programme.desc: An in-depth look at Mark Chapman, the man who murdered John Lennon on December 8, 1980.

programme.title: Who Killed JFK? The Conspiracies
programme.desc: Look back on the moment that changed the course of world history, questioning the official record. Was the assassination a conspiracy?

programme.title: Marilyn Monroe: Fascination
programme.desc: Marilyn Monroe, from childhood poverty, neglect & loneliness to premature death, she endured criticism, insecurities, drug dependence, numerous miscarriages, & 3 broken marriages. Despite her demons, her beauty, talent & quick wit amazed all.

programme.title: Jackie O: A Remarkable Life
programme.desc: Jacqueline Kennedy Onassis captivated the world as first lady with grace and elegance. But behind the glamorous facade was a woman of resilience, navigating unimaginable loss and triumph.

programme.title: Oh My God!
programme.desc: Join host Tevya Heller on this cultural journey in his search for God. It's an inviting and insightful look at the spiritual teachings, customs, and daily lives of families of different faiths.

programme.title: Voices of Valor
programme.desc: Carl Higbie sits down with three fellow veterans to discuss topics like the failures of the VA, how weak American society has become, and the difficulties veterans face when returning to civilian life.

programme.title: Shattered Lives
programme.desc: Describing the devastating impact of the Fraunces Tavern bombing on the Connor and Berger families and its many other victims. And the FALN's decade-long reign of murder and destruction.

programme.title: The Big Focus
programme.desc: John Bachman focuses on the biggest news from D.C., N.Y., and around America!

programme.title: The Freedom File: Judge Napolitano

programme.title: Biblical Prophecy: The End Times
programme.desc: Examines how world events are lining up with Christian and Jewish eschatology. Biblical experts explain how major events today warn of what is to come.

programme.title: Doomsday In Pompeii
programme.desc: In 79AD Mount Vesuvius erupted, covering the surrounding cities with a thick layer of volcanic ash, pumice, and mud. One such city was Pompeii. The remains show details of the everyday lives of Romans thousands of years ago.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Volcanoes are Earth's geologic architects. Their explosive force has crafted mountains and created most of the Earth's surface. A look at what makes these sleeping beasts so deadly.

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: The story of the life and mind of the legendary author J.D. Salinger and the events that led to the birth of his iconic book The Catcher in the Rye.

programme.title: Where hands touch
programme.desc: In 1944, a 15-year-old girl, daughter of a white German mother and a black African father, meets a member of the Hitler Youth. They become bound by the realization of the horrors being committed around them.

programme.title: The Confirmation
programme.desc: A divorced father and his eight-year-old son, spend a rather predictable weekend together, but when a valuable toolbox gets stolen, the search for the thieves will turn into a true family bonding.

programme.title: The Buddy Holly Story
programme.desc: Buddy Holly laid the foundations for a generation of popular music with his ground-breaking combination of country music and rhythm & blues.

programme.title: Emperor
programme.desc: EMPEROR is a gripping tale of love and honour forged between fierce enemies of war, a story inspired by true events, of the bold and secret moves that won peace in the shadows of postwar Japan.

programme.title: Chloe & Theo
programme.desc: Chloe, a young woman who has been searching for something to believe in, is living on the streets of New York City. She comes face to face with an Inuit Eskimo named Theo, who was sent By his elders to send a message to humankind.

programme.title: The Big Short
programme.desc: When the banks committed the greatest fraud in US history, four outsiders risked it all to take them down. Based on the unbelievable true story and best-selling book from the author of The Blind Side and Moneyball, critics are calling The Big Short “brilliant and explosive”...

programme.title: The Public
programme.desc: The Public is about downtown Cincinnati librarians Stuart Goodson and Myra who see their regular winter day shaken up when homeless patrons decide to take shelter in their library for the night. What starts as a peaceful sit-in quickly escalates into a face-off with the police and the media.

programme.title: I Am Woman
programme.desc: The story of Helen Reddy, who in 1966 landed in NYC with her three-year-old daughter, a suitcase and $230 in her pocket. Within five years she was one of the biggest superstars of her time, and an icon of the 1970s feminist movement.

programme.title: Love is a Piece of Cake
programme.desc: Jessie Dale is a third generation baker who loves her cake shop more than anything in the world. When developers threaten to buy her building and force her out, she must do all she can to save her bakery, all while juggling a blossoming romance with her client's brother.

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: Once upon a time, screenwriter Keith Michaels was on top of the world. But now, he's divorced, broke and hasn't written a hit film in years. His attitude slowly begins to turn when he meets Holly, a single mum.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

programme.title: Love Wrecked
programme.desc: Jenny Taylor has found her ideal man who she just knows would sweep her off her feet. The only problem?

programme.title: My Favorite Girlfriend
programme.desc: Conrad's meticulously organized lifestyle is upended when he meets Molly, an enigmatic woman who seems to share headspace with multiple other women with distinct identities - each with traits that Conrad finds lovable.

programme.title: Cooking with Love
programme.desc: Hardworking & optimistic television producer, Kelly, doesn't have time for love. Along with her mentor Amanda, Kelly dives into another season of the Little Gourmet, a kids cooking show, when hot-headed Chef Stephen is dropped into Kelly's life as a last minute replacement host.

programme.title: The Wedding Arrangements
programme.desc: When talented botanist Violet needs help preparing flower arrangements for a high-profile wedding, she calls upon Jack, a handsome nature photographer who has taken over responsibility for his grandfather's flower shed.

programme.title: 10 Years
programme.desc: 10 Years follows a group of friends on the night of their high school reunion who, a decade after leaving school, still haven't quite grown up.

programme.title: Still Today
programme.desc: After being left at the altar, Pete's groomsman give him a wedding gift he'll never forget. An escort. Maybe it's the Lunar Eclipse, maybe it's fate, but after a magical night in the city maybe this girl is what Pete needed all along.

programme.title: Straight Up
programme.desc: A gay OCD twentysomething finds his intellectual soul mate in a struggling actress.

programme.title: Yes
programme.desc: An American woman and a Middle-Eastern man confront some of the greatest conflicts of our generation: religious, political and sexual a pair of new lovers leaving a trail of heartbreak behind them as they embark on a tumultuous journey across continents and cultures.

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back In Business
programme.desc: The buzz is back in Barbershop 2. Calvin is struggling to keep his father's shop alive, this time against urban developers looking to replace "mom & pop" establishments with name-brand chains. The world changes, but some things never go out of style...

programme.title: Legend
programme.desc: In a land where beauty is preserved by the innocence of those who live there, two young people become entangled in the ongoing battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Seeking a way to save their doomed world, a crew of tiny, human-looking aliens arrives on Earth in the perfect disguise--a spaceship shaped like an ordinary man.

programme.title: Runaway Jury
programme.desc: Set in New Orleans, this is the story of a mysterious man, Nick Easter. Nick gets himself not only on the jury of a landmark case against a gun manufacturer, but as the foreman, in an attempt to influence the other jury members to vote a certain way.

programme.title: And So It Goes
programme.desc: A self-absorbed realtor enlists the help of his neighbor when he's suddenly left in charge of the granddaughter he never knew existed until his estranged son drops her off at his home.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: In this classic romantic comedy, a Brooklyn widow (Cher) is ready to get married again. Only this time, she plans on doing it right, even if she has to say “yes” to a man she doesn't really love.

programme.title: The Sentinel
programme.desc: Compromised by his affair with the first lady, a veteran secret service agent is framed as a potential presidential assassin and must rely on a hostile former protégé to flush out the real culprit.

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: Armand and Albert have built the perfect life for themselves tending to their Miami nightclub. But their pastel tranquility is shaken when Armand's son announces that he's getting married to the daughter of ultra-conservative Senator Keeley... and they're all getting together for dinner!

programme.title: Foster Boy
programme.desc: A for-profit Foster care agency puts a known sex offender into the same foster home as a lawyer's young client, Jamal, with catastrophic results.

programme.title: Wild Card
programme.desc: Nick Wild (Jason Statham) is a Las Vegas bodyguard with lethal professional skills and a personal gambling problem. When a friend is beaten by a sadistic thug, Nick strikes back, only to find out the thug is the son of a powerful mob boss.

programme.title: Moonstruck
programme.desc: In this classic romantic comedy, a Brooklyn widow (Cher) is ready to get married again. Only this time, she plans on doing it right, even if she has to say “yes” to a man she doesn't really love.

programme.title: Dan In Real Life
programme.desc: In this down-to-earth dramedy, a widowed advice columnist and single father (Steve Carell) falls in love with a woman (Juliette Binoche) only to discover she is dating his brother.

programme.title: Bedazzled
programme.desc: Elliot Richards is a hapless young man consumed by unrequited love, and desperate to change his life, he makes a deal with the Devil who slyly promises to do just that - for a price.

programme.title: Before You Know It
programme.desc: An unmissable New-York- based “dramedy” in the vein of Woody Allen. Stage manager Rachel (Hannah Pearl Utt) is the only thing standing between her family and utter chaos. She then discovers that her presumed-dead mother (Judith Light: Transparent) is alive and thriving as a soap-opera star!

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Big Momma is back — and this time he has big backup: his teenage stepson Trent (Brendan T. Jackson). Martin Lawrence returns as FBI agent Malcolm Turner and as Turner's deep-cover alter-ego Big Momma.

programme.title: Bogus
programme.desc: When a young boy's mother dies, he invents an imaginary friend to accompany him to his new home far away. How can a boy be lonely with a gentle giant named Bogus? Gerard Depardieu and Whoopi Goldberg star together for the first time in this warmhearted tale of magic and fantasy.

programme.title: Monte Carlo
programme.desc: Grace (Selena Gomez) is an ordinary girl who becomes an accidental princess when a family summer trip to Paris turns into the fantasy of a lifetime. Living like royalty, Grace, along with her two best friends, discovers who she really is – by assuming another person's identity.

programme.title: Flypaper
programme.desc: A man caught in the middle of two simultaneous robberies at the same bank desperately tries to protect the teller with whom he's secretly in love.

programme.title: Cheap Thrills
programme.desc: Craig loses his low-wage job. He heads to a bar and encounters an old friend. The two are roped into a round of drinks by a wealthy couple who engages them in a series of innocent dares in exchange for money. It seems like easy and much needed money, but how far are they willing to go for money?

programme.title: Yes, God, Yes
programme.desc: Growing up in the Midwest in the early OOs, sixteen-year-old Alice has always been a good Catholic. But when an innocent AOL chat turns racy, she discovers masturbation and is overwhelmed with guilt. Seeking redemption, she attends a mysterious religious retreat to try and suppress her urges...

programme.title: The Grand Duke of Corsica
programme.desc: A cantankerous and brilliant architect, Alfred Rott, embarks upon a highly unusual commission for an eccentric billionaire in Malta who calls himself the ‘Grand Duke of Corsica'. A deadly malaria epidemic sweeps the island causing panic, but Alfred remains to finish the job.

programme.title: Christmas On The River
programme.desc: When a woman returns home to celebrate the anniversary of the town's Sugarcane Festival, she rediscovers the magic of Christmas. Starring Jana Kramer (2019)

programme.title: A Gift For Christmas
programme.desc: Aiden is swept off his feet when Darcy knocks him over on her bicycle. Suffering from amnesia, they attempt to rediscover who Aiden really is. But will their adventure ultimately lead to love? (2017)

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: Rebecca returns home for Christmas after being fired. While there she also attends a friend's wedding, but when she tries to leave she relives Christmas Eve over and over till she gets it right.

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: (2015) Romance starring Denise Richards and Patrick Muldoon. A high-flying executive inherits half of her aunt's bakery, but when she meets the co-owner, will it be a recipe for disaster or romance?

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: (2017) Holiday rom-com starring Candace Cameron Bure. Twin sisters swap lives for Christmas, but the switcheroo turns into a mismatch full of festive surprises.

programme.title: Maggie's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: A single mother must balance her career and raising her son whilst romance begins to spark between her and her son's tutor. Starring Jill Wagner (2017)

programme.title: The Nine Lives Of Christmas
programme.desc: (2014) Festive romance with Brandon Routh and Kimberley Sustad. A committed bachelor and a busy vet student have no time for love. But will the arrival of a stray tabby lead to the purr-fect romance?

programme.title: 12 Pups of Christmas
programme.desc: (2019) Paw-fect festive drama with Charlotte Sullivan. A lonely woman is tasked with helping a litter of puppies find new homes before Christmas. Will she also manage to get her own fairy-tail ending?

programme.title: Click and Collect
programme.desc: (2018) Comic caper with Stephen Merchant. Mismatched neighbours Andrew and Dev go on a reluctant cross-country road trip to buy a sparkly and elusive Christmas present for Andrew's young daughter.

programme.title: The Santa Squad
programme.desc: (2020) Festive fun with Aaron Ashmore. When a former art teacher is hired to decorate a busy widower's home for the holidays, she teaches his family an important lesson on the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: Christmas Tail
programme.desc: (2014) Tail-wagging romance with Chandra West. After a single mum's puppy gets lost and is adopted by a single dad, they argue over who gets to keep him. Will they realise love is a four-legged word?

programme.title: Her Magical Christmas
programme.desc: (2017) Seasonal drama with Jessica Lowndes. Heartbroken at Christmas, a woman loses her sparkle until magical ornaments sent by her mother help bring her hope, courage and maybe a touch of new love.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Super High Roller (SHR)-The €100,000 Super High Roller reaches its climactic finale with six elite players vying for nearly €1.4 million. Leading the pack is 2015 Monte Carlo Main Event champion Adrian Mateos, facing off against poker heavyweights Mikita Badziakouski, László Bujtas, and Marius Gierse, plus wildcards Kent Staahle and Mikalai Vaskaboinikau. With life-changing money on the line, who will claim the prestigious title?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 1 (ME1)-After a three-year hiatus, the prestigious EPT Monte Carlo €5,000 Main Event returns in spectacular fashion. Day 2 brings together poker's biggest names, including high-stakes specialist Patrik Antonius, World Champion Koray Aldemir, Italian ace Mustapha Kanit, and trailblazing two-time EPT champion Victoria Coren-Mitchell. The battle for poker immortality begins.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 2 (ME2)-Tension mounts as the money bubble approaches in Monte Carlo's Main Event. With 159 players set to cash for at least €8,690, every decision matters. EPT legends Patrik Antonius and Davidi Kitai command the feature table while 2019 PSPC champion Ramon Colillas holds the chip lead. Who will survive the bubble and who will go home empty-handed?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 3 (ME3)-The money bubble has burst, but for seasoned pro Ole Schemion-who has earned over $5 million in Monte Carlo alone-a minimum cash isn't enough. He faces a formidable challenge from French star Gaëlle Baumann and online legend Jussi Nevanlinna at the feature table. With real money now guaranteed, the gloves come off.

programme.title: Up & Adams
programme.desc: Kay Adams and a rotating roster of current and former players discuss the biggest storylines in the NFL.

programme.title: Run It Back
programme.desc: Michelle Beadle, Chandler Parsons and Lou Williams discuss the biggest NBA games, matchups and storylines from around the league.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 4 (ME4)-PSPC champion Ramon Colillas surges into the top five as just 40 players remain in the EPT Monte Carlo Main Event. Day 3 intensifies as competitors battle to reach the final two tables. With the finish line in sight, who has what it takes to keep their championship dreams alive?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 5 (ME5)-The field narrows to just 16 survivors, including EPT Dublin champion Niall Farrell and PSPC winner Ramon Colillas. With over €41,000 already locked up, the stakes couldn't be higher as players fight for their place at the final table of nine. Every hand could be the difference between glory and heartbreak.

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 6 (ME6)-Nine players remain, but only six will advance to the final day with a shot at nearly €1 million and poker immortality. Can PSPC champion Ramon Colillas extend his remarkable run to another major final table, or will his epic journey end just short of the ultimate prize?

programme.title: European Poker Tour
programme.desc: Main Event Episode 7 (ME7)-The moment of truth arrives at the EPT Monte Carlo final table. Six players-two businessmen, one qualifier, and three seasoned professionals-wage the ultimate battle for almost €1 million and the coveted EPT trophy. After days of intense competition, only one can claim poker's most prestigious prize.

programme.desc: Charlie unknowingly sleeps with an elderly man's (Orson Bean) hot trophy wife.

programme.desc: Charlie organizes an intervention to keep Alan from reuniting with Judith.

programme.desc: Charlie likes dating Isabella (Jodi Lyn O'Keefe), a wild, sexually uninhibited woman, until she threatens to put a curse on his manhood.

programme.title: We're the Millers
programme.desc: Small-time pot dealer David learns the hard way that no good deed goes unpunished; trying to help some teens, he is jumped by thugs and loses his cash and stash. Now, David's in big debt to his supplier and to wipe the slate clean, he must go to Mexico to pick up the guy's latest shipment. To accomplish his mission, Dave devises a foolproof plan: He packs a fake family into a huge RV and heads south of the border for a wild weekend that is sure to end with a bang.

programme.title: Grown Ups
programme.desc: The death of their childhood basketball coach leads to a reunion for some old friends (Adam Sandler, Kevin James, Chris Rock), who gather at the site of a championship celebration years earlier. Picking up where they left off, the buddies -- with wives and children in tow -- discover why age does not, necessarily, equal maturity.

programme.title: Grown Ups 2
programme.desc: Lenny Feder moves his family back to his hometown to be with his friends, but he finds -- what with old bullies, new bullies, party crashers and more -- that he hasn't left the crazy life behind in Los Angeles. Lenny's friends must also cope with their own challenges: Eric must face his ultimate fear; Kurt has gone back to work as a cable repairman; and Marcus learns that he has an 18-year-old son.

programme.title: Dirty Grandpa
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Jason Kelly is one week away from marrying his boss's controlling daughter, putting him on the fast track for a partnership at his firm. Tricked by his grandfather Dick, Jason finds himself driving the foulmouthed old man to Daytona Beach, Fla., for a wild spring break that includes frat parties, bar fights and a night of karaoke. While Jason worries about the upcoming wedding, Dick tries to show his grandson how to live life to the fullest.

programme.desc: The Top Gun Naval Fighter Weapons School is where the best of the best train to refine their elite flying skills. When hotshot fighter pilot Maverick (Tom Cruise) is sent to the school, his reckless attitude and cocky demeanor put him at odds with the other pilots, especially the cool and collected Iceman (Val Kilmer). But Maverick isn't only competing to be the top fighter pilot, he's also fighting for the attention of his beautiful flight instructor, Charlotte Blackwood (Kelly McGillis).

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: The Double Deuce is the meanest, loudest and rowdiest bar south of the Mason-Dixon Line, and Dalton (Patrick Swayze) has been hired to clean it up. He might not look like much, but the Ph.D.-educated bouncer proves he's more than capable -- busting the heads of troublemakers and turning the roadhouse into a jumping hot-spot. But Dalton's romance with the gorgeous Dr. Clay (Kelly Lynch) puts him on the bad side of cutthroat local big shot Brad Wesley (Ben Gazzara).

programme.title: Live: Good Morning Football
programme.desc: NFL Network enters the morning show fray with a three-hour live presentation. Each day, "Good Morning Football" brings viewers up-to-the-minute breaking NFL news and local NFL stories on a national platform. The show features a combination of headline-making interviews and a discussion of a wide array of issues in the areas of sports, news and entertainment. By booking celebrity guests and opinionated national and local journalists -- and taking advantage of a close collaboration with all 32 NFL franchises -- "Good Morning Football" breaks out within and well beyond its time period.

Desperate to keep his fragile home life intact, Cliff agrees to partner with Ricky and run cocaine across Montana.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Antiheroes
programme.desc: From `Dirty Harry' and `The Godfather' to the deeply imperfect gang from the `Fast and the Furious' franchise, this Cinema List celebrates our favourite anti-heroes.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Red Right Hand
programme.desc: Cash is trying to live a quiet, honest life in a small Appalachian town. When a vicious crime boss forces him back into her services, he soon learns he's capable of anything to protect his family and his home.

programme.title: Ghost Rider
programme.desc: Comic-book adventure about a stunt motorcyclist tricked into making a pact with Mephistopheles. The rider can only escape doing the demon's bidding if he agrees to battle the dark lord's son. To this end, he assumes the identity of the supernatural Ghost Rider, a terrifying night-time vigilante with a flaming skull.

programme.title: Novocaine
programme.desc: When the girl of his dreams gets kidnapped, a man turns his inability to feel pain into an unexpected advantage as he fights a bunch of thugs to get her back.

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Captain John Miller takes his men behind enemy lines to find Private James Ryan, whose three brothers have been killed in combat. Surrounded by the brutal realties of war, while searching for Ryan, each man embarks upon a personal journey and discovers their own strength to triumph over an uncertain future with honour, decency and courage.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Doc's violent, bank-robbing cronies, including Buddy, Bats and Darling, get in and out of Dodge before it's too late. He's not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

programme.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance
programme.desc: Johnny Blaze gets a chance to rid himself of the Ghost Rider curse forever when members of a secret church hire him to save a boy from Satan.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richard's throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that they're the ones being hunted.

Lively action fantasy based on the cult comic book.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers unite to explore a mythical, uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean. Cut off from everything they know, they venture into the domain of the mighty Kong, igniting the ultimate battle between man and nature. As their mission of discovery soon becomes one of survival, they must fight to escape from a primal world where humanity does not belong.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Sniper and U.S. Navy SEAL Chris Kyle saves many lives on battlefields in Iraq while striving to be a good husband and father to his loved ones back in America.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. Hurtling through a succession of sex and violence in order to keep his pulse rate up, he must seek revenge and keep himself and his girlfriend alive.

programme.title: King of Killers
programme.desc: Garan is part of a group of international hitmen who are contracted to take out the most dangerous killer in the world, only to find out that they're the ones being hunted.

programme.title: Vendetta
programme.desc: When his daughter is brutally murdered and legal justice looks unlikely, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution.

programme.title: White Elephant
programme.desc: When two cops witness an assassination attempt, a ruthless crime boss orders Gabriel Tancredi, an ex-Marine turned mob enforcer, to eliminate any and all threats.

programme.title: American Night
programme.desc: An art dealer and a ruthless New York mafia boss fight for money, power and love.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Sniper and U.S. Navy SEAL Chris Kyle saves many lives on battlefields in Iraq while striving to be a good husband and father to his loved ones back in America.

programme.title: The Fall Guy
programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: Fuelled by his restored faith in humanity, and inspired by Superman's selfless act, Bruce Wayne enlists newfound ally Diana Prince to face an even greater threat. Together, Batman and Wonder Woman work quickly to recruit a team to stand against this newly-awakened enemy. Despite the formation of an unprecedented league of heroes in Batman, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Cyborg and the Flash, it may be too late to save the planet from an assault of catastrophic proportions.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agency's name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: The Man of Steel returns to Earth after a five-year absence to find Lex Luthor ready to take over the world, and Lois Lane shacked up with a new man and a kid. The people have lost faith in their former saviour. Can Superman save their lives and regain their trust?

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: A Mexican village is at the mercy of Calvera, the leader of a band of outlaws. The townspeople, too afraid to fight for themselves, hire seven American gunslingers to free them from the bandits' raids. The professional gunmen train the villagers to defend themselves, then plan a trap for the evil Calvera.

programme.title: Shazam!
programme.desc: Billy Batson is a streetwise 14-year-old who can magically transform into the adult superhero Shazam simply by shouting out one word. His newfound powers soon get put to the test when he squares off against the evil Dr. Thaddeus Sivana.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: A widowed farmer, with a brave but brutal military past, decides not to join up when the British arrive in 1776. However, when his son enlists and is later captured by the enemy, the former soldier must abandon his new-found pacifist principles in order to rescue his oldest child, and forms a regiment of Carolina patriots, whose guerrilla tactics prove pivotal to the US war effort.

programme.title: Kraven the Hunter
programme.desc: Kraven's complex relationship with his ruthless father starts him down a path of vengeance, motivating him to become not only the greatest hunter in the world, but also one of its most feared.

programme.title: Snakes on a Plane
programme.desc: An FBI agent must contend with a swarm of deadly serpents that have been released on board an airliner to kill the witness he is escorting to trial.

programme.title: Bad Boys II
programme.desc: Loose-cannon cops Lowrey and Burnett reduce Miami to rubble as they try to stop Cuban and Russian drug smugglers from flooding Florida with ecstasy.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: Midnight Run
programme.desc: A gruff cop turned bounty hunter captures a fugitive accountant accused of fraud and sets off from New York for Los Angeles to collect his prize. However, he is unaware that both the Mafia and the FBI are also on the accountant's trail and hot on their heels.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: It's Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking' Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Paul's athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: Two Weeks Notice
programme.desc: An ambitious law graduate decides to leave her job as she feels her skills are not appreciated by her boss, who basically treats her like his PA. However, he won't let her go that easily.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harry's long lost daughter, and Lloyd's in love again.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a retired widower in his 70s becomes senior intern at a fashion based e-commerce company. Jules Ostin, the founder, while first hesitant, soon learns to respect and even like her new intern despite their age difference.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: Parenting and marriage is becoming tougher and tougher for Toula and her husband Ian. Not only has their relationship lost some of its spark, but they're also dealing with a rebellious teenage daughter who clashes with Greek traditions. On top of that, Toula must contend with aging parents and the endless needs of cousins and friends. When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once he's had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newton's wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: A guy is getting married, but his alter-ego keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts his alter-ego's genes, but an accident and a dog hair see the later-ego take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, the man and his wife perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until his alter-ego steals it.

programme.title: Bad Teacher
programme.desc: A rude, drug-abusing educator vies with a perky colleague for the attentions of a rich and handsome substitute teacher.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: The Men Who Stare at Goats
programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: The Blues Brothers
programme.desc: After his release from prison, Jake reunites with his brother, Elwood -- collectively known as the `Blues Brothers'. Jake's first task is to save the orphanage the brothers grew up in from closing, by raising 5000 dollars to pay back taxes. The two are convinced they can earn the money by getting their old band back together. However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.

programme.title: Mr. Deeds
programme.desc: Deeds is much-loved in his small town, but following the death of a long-lost uncle, who also happens to be a billionaire tycoon, Deeds inherits a fortune and heads for the big city to run his uncle's company. When a media frenzy ensues surrounding Deeds' inheritance, reporter Babe Bennett goes undercover to out Deeds as the small-town fool she thinks he is.

programme.title: Horrible Bosses
programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times? The trio drunkenly and hypothetically discuss how to kill their bosses, and before they know it, they've hired a murder consultant to help them pull off the three deeds.

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury
programme.desc: Two siblings dance their way through the Los Angeles club scene while trying to open up their own establishment.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Beetlejuice Beetlejuice
programme.desc: Still haunted by Beetlejuice, Lydia's life gets turned upside down when her daughter discovers a portal to the afterlife. When someone says Beetlejuice's name three times, the mischievous demon soon returns to unleash his very own brand of mayhem.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: Father and stepfather Dusty and Brad join forces to make Christmastime perfect for the children. Their newfound partnership soon gets put to the test when Dusty's old-school, macho dad and Brad's gentle father arrive to turn the holiday upside down. After a sudden change in plans, the four men decide to take the kids to a luxury resort for a fun-filled getaway that turns into a hilarious and chaotic adventure.

When a shocking family secret comes to light, the entire Portokalos clan makes plans to come together for an even bigger wedding than before.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: When a plot by a dangerous criminal organisation endangers the beach, Mitch Buchannon leads his elite squad of lifeguards on a mission to prove that one doesn't need to wear a badge to save the bay.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film `Saturday Night', we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including `Wayne's World', `Bridesmaids' and more.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that he is about to cause.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon can't let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: 13 Going on 30
programme.desc: A girl who's sick of the social strictures of junior high is transformed into a grownup overnight. In this feel-good fairy tale, teenager Jenna wants a boyfriend, and when she's unable to find one, she fantasizes about being a well-adjusted adult. Suddenly, her secret desire becomes a reality, and she is transformed into a 30-year-old. However, adulthood, with its own set of male-female challenges, isn't as easy as it looks.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Foregone Conclusion.' However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now' style documentary.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss and can't remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that he's in it for love.

programme.desc: Nick, Dale and Kurt all despise their bosses, but who would be crazy enough to quit their jobs in such poor economic times?
