programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donna's pregnant daughter reunites with her mother's old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Twins
programme.desc: Two very different twin brothers were born as a result of a genetic experiment. Following their birth, the flawless Julius grew up on a paradise island, while the less-than-perfect Vincent was sent to an orphanage. Now, many years later, Vincent is a thief and con man with huge debts. What will Julius think when he searches for his long-lost twin and finds him in jail?

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.desc: A reporter in Iraq may just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the US Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donna's pregnant daughter reunites with her mother's old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Just Friends
programme.desc: An LA record producer returns to his New Jersey hometown ten years after being rejected by his high-school cheerleader crush. Having made the transformation from no-hope geek to Greek god womaniser and with his friend still single, he embarks on a second seduction strategy that does not always go to plan.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Legendary pet detective Ace Ventura returns for another adventure when he's coerced out of retirement while on a soul-searching retreat in the Himalayas. He must now retrieve an endangered white bat from a village located in Africa. The sacred animal was offered up as a wedding dowry from the Wachootoo prince to the Wachati princess, and, if Ace can't track down the culprit behind the kidnapping in time, civil war will break out between the two rival tribes.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Nacho Libre
programme.desc: Brother Ignacio is an orphanage chef who cooks up a plan to earn money for the kids by becoming a Mexican wrestling star. First, he must don a leotard.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: After his latest play flops, JM Barrie finds distraction when he befriends the Llewelyn Davies family, four young boys and their widowed mother Sylvia. His relationship with them threatens his marriage and standing in society, but results in the creation of `Peter Pan'.

programme.title: Mr Bean's Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesn't go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: Unknown to humans, all-out war between cats and dogs has raged since the beginning of time. Now the cats face defeat if scientist Professor Brody can perfect a formula that will make all humans non-allergic to dogs. The cats' leader, Mr Tinkles, plans to steal the serum, but first he must get past fearless dog agent Lou who, thanks to a mistake in recruitment, guards the Brody family.

programme.title: Paulie
programme.desc: A wisecracking parrot caged in a research lab tells his life story to a lonely janitor. Before coming to the science lab, he has passed through the hands of a succession of owners, from a petty criminal to a man who runs a parrot-dancing act. Touched by his colourful story, the janitor conspires to liberate the talking bird.

programme.title: It Takes Two
programme.desc: When a foster child meets the daughter of a bazillionaire, they hatch a plan to solve the problems in their life, and switch identities.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncle's creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncle's secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them', which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually can't afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonka's chocolate factory.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: Stuart Little
programme.desc: A New York couple go to an orphanage to adopt a brother for their only son, but instead come away with a little mouse. On arrival at his new home, the diminutive rodent receives a lukewarm welcome by the boy - and an even frostier reception from the pet cat. Featuring a mixture of live action and animation.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Goosebumps
programme.desc: A young kid teams up with the niece of young adult horror author RL Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Greendale, Maryland.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory
programme.desc: Charlie Bucket comes from a poor family, and spends most of his time dreaming about the chocolate that he loves but usually can't afford. Things change when Willy Wonka, head of the very popular Wonka Chocolate empire, announces a contest in which five gold tickets have been hidden in chocolate bars. Charlie is one of the five kids who finds a lucky ticket and goes on a tour of Wonka's chocolate factory.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: There's trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptune's crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBob's boss, is the culprit. Though he's just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krab's life.

programme.title: My Penguin Friend
programme.desc: A heartbroken fisherman finds a penguin drifting alone in the ocean, drenched in oil from a spill. He not only rescues the sea creature, but takes it under his wing, finding a sense of joy for the first time in years.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit 2
programme.desc: Despite his efforts, Peter can't seem to shake his reputation for mischief among the other rabbits. Once he adventures out of the garden Peter finds himself in a world where mischief is appreciated, but soon his family come to bring him home.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Johnny English Reborn
programme.desc: A haphazard spy returns to MI-7 after years in a Tibetan monastery honing his zen skills. Armed with gizmos, gadgets and chaotic luck he takes on a global ring of assassins.

programme.title: IF
programme.desc: After discovering she can see everyone's imaginary friends, a girl embarks on a magical adventure to reconnect forgotten IFs with their kids.

programme.title: Stuart Little 2
programme.desc: Sequel to the children's story about the adventures of a small mouse, blending live action and computer-animated characters. The eponymous hero befriends a tiny bird wounded by a sinister falcon, but he must enlist the help of the dreaded family cat if he is to protect his new-found friend.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
programme.desc: Sonic, Knuckles and Tails reunite to battle Shadow, a mysterious new enemy with powers unlike anything they've faced before. With their abilities outmatched in every way, they seek out an unlikely alliance to stop Shadow and protect the planet.

programme.title: Reuniting the Rubins
programme.desc: Uptight lawyer Lenny Rubins has to put his dream retirement on hold when he is emotionally blackmailed into reuniting his estranged children.

programme.title: Ella Enchanted
programme.desc: As a child, Ella is put under a spell which makes her constantly obedient. When her evil stepsister starts using the spell against her, Ella must rid herself of the curse if she is to marry the handsome prince, especially as the regent, Sir Edgar, has his own plans for heir to the throne.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: Fibs, pranks and manoeuvres take centre stage amid a 14-year-old habitual liar's bizarre confrontation with an obnoxious filmmaker who is in dire need of a blockbuster.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: A 450lb scientist falls for his new colleague, but out on a date, he's humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion he's only tested previously on hamsters. He ends up turning into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Magical Movies
programme.desc: From Harry Potter to Fantastic Beasts, Ella Enchanted to The Secret Garden. Discover a collection of magical journeys where destiny and wonder collide.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents' deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potter's adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemort's return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teacher's constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: The return of Lord Voldemort wreaks havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds. Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledore's death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harry's home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestrange's clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledore's tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemort's soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix' vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: The year is 1926, and Newt Scamander has just completed a global excursion to find and document an extraordinary array of magical creatures. Arriving in New York for a brief stopover, he might have come and gone without incident, were it not for a No-Maj named Jacob, a misplaced magical case, and the escape of some of Newt's fantastic beasts, which could spell trouble for both the wizarding and No-Maj worlds.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Last Seen Alive
programme.desc: After Will Spann's wife suddenly vanishes at a gas station, his desperate search to find her leads him down a dark path that forces him to run from authorities and take the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who murdered five people, apparently at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of US soldiers.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: Though Kevin has evidenced 23 personalities to his trusted psychiatrist, Dr. Fletcher, there remains one still submerged who is set to materialize and dominate all of the others. Compelled to abduct three teenage girls led by the wilful, observant Casey, Kevin reaches a war for survival among all of those contained within him as the walls between his compartments shatter.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: A murder in Paris' Louvre Museum and cryptic clues in some of Leonardo da Vinci's most famous paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery. For 2,000 years a secret society closely guards information that -- should it come to light -- could rock the very foundations of Christianity.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Crooked cops on the take, mall-time drug lords, sleazy informers and sadistic rich kids ready to kill. For police detective John Shaft, its just another night in the underbelly of New York City, another shift facing down cops and criminals who want him dead and a legal system that thrives on money, not justice.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films playing on Sky Cinema in October 2025, plus other highlights airing on Sky.

programme.title: Poker Face
programme.desc: A tech billionaire gathers his friends at his home for a high-stakes poker game. Things go awry when his mansion is invaded by a dangerous killer.

programme.title: Mob Cops
programme.desc: When a retired NYPD detective writes a book about his family's ties to the mob, it ignites a firestorm between dirty cops working for a brutal crime boss and the officers trying to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Caddo Lake
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old girl mysteriously vanishes, a series of past deaths and disappearances start to link together, forever altering a broken family's history.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-man's-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original group's way of life.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: Small-time crooks One Two and Mumbles decide to legitimately invest in some prime real estate and find themselves out of their depth and in debt to old-school London gangster Lenny Cole. Cole himself is in the middle of a business deal with a Russian gangster, but when his accountant tips off One Two and Mumbles to the details of an upcoming big-money business transaction, the two scallywags swoop in and steal the cash.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.desc: An assassin on his last assignment travels to Fuerteventura to kill a man he's never met.

However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Psycho
programme.desc: Gus Van Sant's remake of the Hitchcock classic about an embezzler who checks into a remote motel run by a psychopath. While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.title: RocknRolla

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the president's bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Perfect Storm
programme.desc: Seafaring drama based on the true story of a commercial fishing boat crew who become caught in a terrifying storm off the coast of Massachusetts. In the autumn of 1991, a fishing boat captain is determined to set sail despite the adverse weather conditions, but when the ice machine breaks down his decision to brave the storm rather than lose his catch results in a battle against 100ft waves.

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: An international hit man and quick change artist is hired by a secret organisation to assassinate Charles de Gaulle.

programme.title: Psycho

While remaining faithful to the original, the modern setting and slightly more explicit shots than the censor would allow in Hitchcock's day make this a fascinating exercise that compares favourably to the original.

programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Lawless
programme.desc: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by a new deputy and other authorities who want a cut of their profits.

programme.desc: Residents of a small island town navigate a murder and the discovery of a million dollars, a series of increasingly bad decisions upend the once peaceful community.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the world's population.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: A CIA agent comes up against a duplicitous American government during his quest to nab a Colombian drug lord.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Lawless

programme.title: Zulu
programme.desc: A true story of two remaining officers desperately trying to rally their meagre force of 105 men against 4,000 attacking Zulu warriors. Cetewayo, ruler of the Zulu kingdom, begins his war against the white invaders with the annihilation of the British army at Isandhlwana and moves on to his next target - the depleted garrison at Rorke's Drift.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in America's former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.title: Now You See Me
programme.desc: A federal agent and an Interpol detective play a cat-and-mouse game with cunning illusionists who rob corrupt business leaders during their performances before funnelling the money to members of the audience.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if he'll live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: When a string of brutal murders terrorises London, it does not take long for legendary detective Sherlock Holmes and his crime-solving partner, Dr Watson, to find the killer, Lord Blackwood. A devotee of the dark arts, Blackwood has a bigger scheme in mind, and his execution plays right into his plans. The game is afoot when Blackwood seems to rise from the grave, plunging Holmes and Watson into the world of the occult and strange technologies.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
programme.desc: The murder of Austria's crown prince leads Holmes, Watson and a Gypsy to a showdown with an evil genius named Moriarty.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Scary chiller about a coastal community plagued by a killer shark. With the summer tourist season at hand, the mayor is keen to keep the first attack hushed up. However, when an expert claims that the attacks are the work of a giant great white shark, there is only one solution - to kill the monster fish before it can feed again.

programme.title: The Krays
programme.desc: The disturbing story of the making of the infamous 60s underworld figures Reggie and Ronnie Kray - from their upbringing by a domineering mother in the deprivation of London's East End. The gangland empire they build is characterised by violence and intimidation, and the film is unflinching in its depiction of their rise to power.

programme.title: Island Medics
programme.desc: A team of doctors and nurses work alongside GPs, paramedics, coastguard, lifeboat and rescue crews to provide emergency care to the residents of the Shetland Islands.

programme.title: Bad Man's River
programme.desc: (1971) Comedy western with Lee Van Cleef and James Mason. It's a wild ride of bank robbing, wife swapping and double crossing as two rivals team up to steal a million bucks from the government.

programme.title: Ride in The Whirlwind
programme.desc: (1966) Western starring Jack Nicholson. Mistaken for outlaws, three cowboys find themselves on the run from a relentless posse hungry for justice.

programme.title: A Reason To Live, A Reason To Die
programme.desc: (1972) Western with James Coburn and Telly Savalas. Branded a coward for surrendering his fort to the Confederates, a Union colonel recruits seven condemned men for a daring mission to recapture it.

programme.title: The Ballad of Lefty Brown
programme.desc: (2017) Action-packed western with Bill Pullman, Peter Fonda and Jim Caviezel. Loyalty and friendship are tested when an ageing gunslinger sets out to avenge his murdered friend.

programme.title: Red Headed Stranger
programme.desc: (1986) Powerful western with Willie Nelson and Morgan Fairchild. When his wife betrays him, a preacher transforms from righteous saint to murderous sinner. But will fate give him a shot at salvation?

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: (2016) Contemporary western starring Woody Harrelson and Liam Hemsworth. A Texas Ranger investigates murders in a mysterious frontier town, only to clash with its sinister leader.

programme.title: Death Rides a Horse
programme.desc: (1967) Brutal western with Lee Van Cleef and John Phillip Law. Fifteen years after his family were massacred by bandits, a young boy is now a skilled gunslinger - and he's hell-bent on revenge...

programme.title: Big Kill
programme.desc: (2019) Modern western with Jason Patric and Danny Trejo. Two misfit gamblers on the run, a tenderfoot and a deadly preacher team up for a date with destiny in a boom town gone bust.

programme.title: The Pledge
programme.desc: (2008) Western with Luke Perry, C. Thomas Howell and Kim Coates. After killing an innocent man, an ex-lawman on a quest for revenge makes a pledge that takes him straight into the path of his prey.

programme.title: Four Fast Guns
programme.desc: (1960) Western with James Craig. A former gunslinger tries to restore order to a lawless town, but is foiled by the efforts of an evil saloon owner whose infirmity grants him immunity from violence.

programme.title: Once Upon A Texas Train
programme.desc: Twenty years after a gang of outlaws fail to rob a gold train, the leader tries the same robbery.

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

programme.title: Symbols Of Wisdom
programme.desc: Brainy Smurf desperately wants to be more like Papa Smurf. Can a hair tonic be the answer? Can Gargamel be able to finally capture the Smurfs? Does wisdom really reside in a beard?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Gingerbread Smurfs: Brainy feels up to the occasion when he starts the recipe for cookies. He is sure to win the contest: he borrowed a recipe from Papa Smurf's Book of Magic. But a big surprise, and some nasty happenings, await poor Brainy... and the whole Village.

programme.title: Secret Of The Village Well
programme.desc: Why is Clumsy Smurf waiting day and night near the Village well? What is the wish that he wants to be kept secret? How is Gargamel going to be mixed up in this mysterious affair? Is Gargamel going to catch the Smurfs at last?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a bunny family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival. Gargamel sees his chance to capture the little blue people and disguises himself as a giant bunny. Is he going to catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop?

programme.title: Stop And Smurf The Roses
programme.desc: Wicked Chlorhydris, the sorceress, wants to destroy all love and beauty on Earth. She has to annihilate Wood Elf Grove, where the loving mute elf Laconia cares for the wild flowers. But the Smurfs are there to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lost Smurf: Every 500 years, Castle Captor appears and abducts innocent travelers. Grandpa takes off in his balloon for the castle, where he meets Nanny Smurf, who's been missing for 500 years. They have only a short time to escape, or they'll become permanent guests!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Land Of The Lost And Found: Hefty, Handy, and Brainy lose Papa's telescope and Scour, the Lord of Lost and Found, finds it. The Smurfs say they'll trade anything to get it back, so Scour takes their most valuable possessions – handiness, heftiness and braininess. They journey to his domain to retrieve what was lost.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Archives Of Evil: The evil warlock Nemesis shows up at the Wizards' Library to steal the knowledge from the Archives of Evil and so get the Long Life Stone. But it's Brainy who inadvertently saves the day when he switches Greedy's cookbook and Papa's spell book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A House For Nanny: Roommates Smurfette and Nanny are getting on each other's nerves, so the time has come for Nanny to have a house of her own. As Nanny and Smurfette trek off to find a house-warming plant, the others design the Smurfliest house for her.

programme.title: Smurfing For Ghosts
programme.desc: Peewit is at the castle of his friends Selwyn and Tallulah when Uncle Fenwick, the friendly ghost, asks for his help in chasing a few relatives who've come to haunt him... Peewit has to get help from the Smurfs, and a merry chase begins...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tallest Smurf: Smurfs are three apples high. Smurflings are twenty-five smurfberries high. Except for Slouchy, who only measures twenty-two smurfberries. Apart from Baby Smurf, Slouchy is the shortest Smurf, and the jibes and taunts of the other Smurflings make him wish he were the tallest of the Smurfs... Now it so happens that Gourdy the Genie loves to grant wishes...

programme.title: Smurfette's Gift
programme.desc: Every year, Smurfette snoops around to discover what her birthday presents will be before she receives them. But this year, Sassette has created the Keep-Smurfette's-Presents-a-Surprise-Committee. Nat has discovered a cave where they might be able to hide all the gifts prepared by the Smurfs. But what this cave also hides is a greedy imp who is not only interested in keeping Smurfette's gifts...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sassette's Tooth: Oh dear! Sassette has lost a tooth. Papa Smurf explains that if she puts her tooth under her pillow, the Mouse Fairy will bring her a present in the morning. But the next morning there is no present under the pillow. The Mouse Fairy has not been. She has been captured in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. And now the evil wizard is concocting a dreadful plan.

programme.title: Smurfs On Wheels
programme.desc: Every year, all the Smurfs make the long hike to Dreamy Steamy Springs. But this year, only Grandpa Smurf, Papa Smurf and Nat are going to walk there. All the other Smurfs are too busy – and too lazy – to walk. But then Handy comes up with what he calls his Customised Smurfwagon. No need to walk, you just let yourself roll along... Of course, things won't be as simple as all that.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Calling Dr Smurf: As his name implies, Dabbler Smurf is incapable of staying put in any one activity. He goes from one pursuit to another with the greatest of ease and never finishes what he's begun. But suddenly here he is smitten by the love of the medical profession. Dabbler wants to become a doctor and all of the Smurfs, with Papa Smurf in the lead, are going to help him to achieve his wish.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - All The Smurf's A Stage: Poet Smurf's new play is going to be his greatest work ever, and it will feature the most favourite Smurf of all: Smurfette in the leading female role. All the other Smurfs vie for the honour of playing opposite Smurfette. Even Timid Smurf, who is the shy and retiring type, is a candidate for the part. Brainy Smurf, self-appointed manager of the play, does not see it that way...

programme.title: Reckless Smurfs
programme.desc: This time, Gargamel's plan cannot fail. Undeterred by Azrael's derisive cackling, the evil wizard perfects a magic substance called Daredevil Dust, which is going to change all the Smurfs into rash, incautious swashbucklers. Will Papa Smurf fall into Gargamel's trap? Will their enemy catch all the Smurfs? Will this story have a happy ending?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Most Popular Smurf: Jokey's surprise exploding packages have been changed by a spell. Picture the practical joker's discombobulating when he realises that all the surprises that he hands to unsuspecting Smurfs contain nothing but real gifts! No more ka-boom, no more jokes, no more fun! Plus the unenviable new position of Most Popular Smurf in the Village, surrounded by admirers begging for more presents...

programme.title: Tailor's Magic Needle
programme.desc: Tailor Smurf has to make an outfit for every Smurf before the Fall fashion show. Brainy Smurf wants to help him and, using Papa Smurf's book of Magic, he conjures up a magic needle that sews ten times faster than tailor... But is it really any good?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - I Smurf To The Trees: Helped, if that is the right word, by Scruple, his apprentice, the evil wizard Gargamel once again wants to catch the Smurfs. He is able to steal from Mother Nature a magic formula that wakes up the trees. Suddenly the forest speaks and moves! Now, for sure, Gargamel will be able to capture the little blue people, won't he? Or will he? And what if all the trees leave for good?

programme.title: A Myna Problem
programme.desc: Clumsy has found a new friend. A Myna bird, very good speaker indeed, apt to repeat every syllable it hears... even not very nice things, thus creating a lot of bad feelings in the Village of the Smurfs. How this bird can change the Smurfs into ducks and how this strange circumstance foils one more of Gargamel's evil plans will have to be seen to be believed.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Dr Evil And Mr Nice: Life isn't always easy for Scruple, the evil wizard Gargamel's young apprentice. Gargamel is a crabby, peevish, cantankerous company at best. But, here is a magic formula that is guaranteed to change the meanest of persons into a gentle, loving soul. Scruple lures his master into drinking it... and paradoxically, this means that the Smurf Village is in greater danger than ever!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Gargamel's New Job: At last here is a post worthy of the great Gargamel's talent and experience! At least, that's what the evil wizard thinks as he learns of Prince Theodore's need of a new court magician. The Smurfs are delighted when they see Gargamel and his good-for-nothing apprentice, Scruple, leaving their hovel in the forest. But maybe they are rejoicing too soon. Who knows what peril Gargamel has in store?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Greedy Goes On Strike: Get up early in the morning, before any other Smurf is out of bed, to prepare a scrumptious Smurfberry muffin. Spend all morning on preparing Smurf delicacies for lunch. Than all afternoon to have dinner ready – and delicious – on time. And do you get so much as a thank you form the Smurfs? So Greedy Smurf quits. The Village is in trouble... And soon, so is Greedy.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Papa Smurf, Papa Smurf: Yes, there can be too much of a good thing. When an accident happens to Papa Smurf's magic formula and he ends up multiplied by two, the Smurfs are elated: two Papa Smurfs can give twice the good counsel and twice the loving that one can. But after a while, things get too complex in the Village. Especially when another accident doubles the number of Gargamels!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Scarlet Croaker: Greenpeedeepee Swamp is the only place you can find Swamp Root, the delicious and necessary ingredient of Greedy Smurf's famed swamp root stew. Unfortunately, it is also one place where you can find those hideous Wartmongers. Even though Sassette and the Smurfs save a young Wartmonger's life, they still end up being captured by the others. But the Scarlet Croaker will save them! Maybe.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Royal Drum: No one believes Grandpa Smurf when he tells of far-away jungles and savannahs teeming with wild giant cats, striped horses, long-necked leaf-eaters and strange tribes... Only some Smurflings give some credit to his tales. But when Grandpa Smurf hears the sound of the magic Royal Drum in the forest, the one that can tame wild beasts, he sets out to prove that he's not an old addle-brained storyteller.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Tis The Season To Be Smurfy: This is Wild Smurf's first Christmas, and he's impressed by the decorations in the Village of the Smurfs. But Grandpa and Sassette are going to teach him the real meaning of Christmas when they help an old couple to live the most beautiful Christmas they've ever seen...

programme.title: The Whole Smurf And Nothing But The Smurf
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel is able to capture the Smurfette. Now he is going to give her a truth serum and know all of Papa Smurf' secrets… But then Gargamel makes a big mistake and gives the Smurfette a fib formula!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Secret Of Shadow Swamp: Grouchy, the Smurf who hates everything, doubly hates his own birthday party and goes to hide in Shadow Swamp... He is going to meet strange beings and stranger adventures while the other Smurfs search for him...

programme.title: Smurfiplication
programme.desc: The evil wizard Gargamel creates a magic formula that duplicates everything it touches. And surprise! Suddenly there are six Brainy Smurf! This creates a few interesting situations in the Village... And also at Gargamel's!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Traveller: A dragon terrorizes the Village of the Smurfs. To put the dragon to rest, the Smurfs must find the noted Chinese traveler. Fortunately, Papa Smurf is able to understand the strange customs of the stranger, and even to speak a few words.

programme.title: The Man In The Moon
programme.desc: Sick and tired of not being appreciated, the Man in the Moon quits his job and retires on Earth, to the Village of the Smurfs. The absence of a First Quarter Moon wreaks havoc in the customs of the Smurfs, and Mother Nature and Father Time get dragged in...

programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Pet For Baby Smurf: There is a prize for the cutest pet of a Smurf. Baby Smurf brings a cute, lovely, affectionate Glowing Darling, a pet anybody falls in love with… But this pet is a creation of Gargamel, the evil wizard intent on destroying the Smurfs!

He is sure to win the contest: he borrowed a recipe from Papa Smurf's Book of Magic. But a big surprise, and some nasty happenings, await poor Brainy... and the whole Village.

programme.desc: Why is Clumsy Smurf waiting day and night near the Village well? What is the wish that he wants to be kept secret? How is Gargamel going to be mixed up in this mysterious affair? Is Gargamel going to catch the Smurfs at last?

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Float Full Of Smurfs: The Smurfs must find a bunny family to pull their float in the Autumn Carnival. Gargamel sees his chance to capture the little blue people and disguises himself as a giant bunny. Is he going to catch all the Smurfs in one fell swoop?

programme.title: Stop And Smurf The Roses
programme.desc: Wicked Chlorhydris, the sorceress, wants to destroy all love and beauty on Earth. She has to annihilate Wood Elf Grove, where the loving mute elf Laconia cares for the wild flowers. But the Smurfs are there to save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Jokey's Funny Bone: Jealous of the attention Vanity Smurf receives when he breaks his toe, Jokey Smurf feigns sickness in hopes of getting recognition. Unfortunately, his ploy turns against him and instead of loving care all he receives is the proverbial pound of curse.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A Loss Of Smurfs: When the emergency call rings, all the Smurfs in the Village drop what they are doing and run to hear the news. But when Vanity Smurf calls for an assembly so that the Smurfs can admire his new hat, it is too much. They send him on his way out of the village, and Vanity has the bad luck of meeting Lofty, the Elf, who suggests a horrible mud bath...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Prince And The Hopper: What is that strange talking frog that Morlock the Wizard sends all of Prince Theodore's soldiers to catch? Is it a demon frog, as he says, or something else? Truth will out when Smurfette and the Smurflings meet the frog. They help to change this frog back into Prince Theodore himself, for he's been the victim of a spell cast by Morlock.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Lost Smurf: Every 500 years, Castle Captor appears and abducts innocent travelers. Grandpa takes off in his balloon for the castle, where he meets Nanny Smurf, who's been missing for 500 years. They have only a short time to escape, or they'll become permanent guests!

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Land Of The Lost And Found: Hefty, Handy, and Brainy lose Papa's telescope and Scour, the Lord of Lost and Found, finds it. The Smurfs say they'll trade anything to get it back, so Scour takes their most valuable possessions – handiness, heftiness and braininess. They journey to his domain to retrieve what was lost.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Archives Of Evil: The evil warlock Nemesis shows up at the Wizards' Library to steal the knowledge from the Archives of Evil and so get the Long Life Stone. But it's Brainy who inadvertently saves the day when he switches Greedy's cookbook and Papa's spell book.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - A House For Nanny: Roommates Smurfette and Nanny are getting on each other's nerves, so the time has come for Nanny to have a house of her own. As Nanny and Smurfette trek off to find a house-warming plant, the others design the Smurfliest house for her.

programme.title: Smurfing For Ghosts
programme.desc: Peewit is at the castle of his friends Selwyn and Tallulah when Uncle Fenwick, the friendly ghost, asks for his help in chasing a few relatives who've come to haunt him... Peewit has to get help from the Smurfs, and a merry chase begins...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Grouchy Makes A Splash: We all know Grouchy Smurf hates a lot of things. But one thing he hates more than anything else is water, when there is enough of it to drown in. You see, Grouchy can't swim. And when the Smurfs notice this peculiarity and try to teach him how to survive in water, the evil wizard Gargamel makes things a little more dangerous than they ought to be....

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - No Smurf Is An Island: Handy Smurf is the one who fixes everything that needs mending in the Village of the Smurfs. But are his efforts really appreciated by the other Smurfs? Not at all. At least this is what Handy feels when he resolves to leave the Smurfs Village forever and live in the sea with Marina the Mermaid...

programme.title: The Answer Smurf
programme.desc: Nobody ever listens to Brainy Smurf's advice, and when Papa Smurf is away and Brainy feels he's in charge, he decides he's going to be the one with all the answers. There is a magic formula in Papa Smurf's Book of Spells that ensures everyone in the Village of the Smurfs is going to ask for Brain's opinion. As if matters weren't difficult enough, here's Gargamel...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - The Tallest Smurf: Smurfs are three apples high. Smurflings are twenty-five smurfberries high. Except for Slouchy, who only measures twenty-two smurfberries. Apart from Baby Smurf, Slouchy is the shortest Smurf, and the jibes and taunts of the other Smurflings make him wish he were the tallest of the Smurfs... Now it so happens that Gourdy the Genie loves to grant wishes...

programme.title: Smurfette's Gift
programme.desc: Every year, Smurfette snoops around to discover what her birthday presents will be before she receives them. But this year, Sassette has created the Keep-Smurfette's-Presents-a-Surprise-Committee. Nat has discovered a cave where they might be able to hide all the gifts prepared by the Smurfs. But what this cave also hides is a greedy imp who is not only interested in keeping Smurfette's gifts...

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: The Smurfs - Sassette's Tooth: Oh dear! Sassette has lost a tooth. Papa Smurf explains that if she puts her tooth under her pillow, the Mouse Fairy will bring her a present in the morning. But the next morning there is no present under the pillow. The Mouse Fairy has not been. She has been captured in one of Gargamel's Smurf traps. And now the evil wizard is concocting a dreadful plan.

programme.title: Django... Adios!
programme.desc: Django, a former federal sheriff, is arrested for allegedly stealing a chest full of dollars that was earmarked for the construction of a school and church in Silver City.

programme.title: Dead Men Don't Make Shadows
programme.desc: Feared bounty hunter Lazar arrives in a gold-mining town to blackmail ex-bandit Barrett, now a ruthless mine owner. Followed by a young gunfighter with his own motive, Lazar forges an uneasy alliance. But as tensions rise, it becomes clear that not everyone is after gold—some seek justice, others revenge.

programme.title: A Coffin from Sartana
programme.desc: After witnessing a brutal massacre, the legendary hero Sartana is ready to do some investigating. Almost everyone in the tiny town of Indian Creek seems eager to buy up the property left behind by the murder victims, ...

programme.title: Four Fast Guns
programme.desc: A gunslinger rides into Purgatory, claiming to be the town tamer they hired—though he killed the real one. For $500, payable to a widow of his victim, he takes on the town's wheelchair-bound crime boss. The outlaw fights to free the town while facing three hired killers sent to eliminate him, testing his resolve and his skill as lawman-for-hire.

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A cavalry officer sympathetic to the wronged Sioux fixes a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant but a dishonest Indian Agent and a hateful General Custer test the Sioux's patience, threatening to derail the peace-talks.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 19, 20, 21
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Iron Brothers
programme.desc: Fur trappers Abel and Henry Iron struggle in the declining fur trade in the Rocky Mountains. After an accidental death during an encounter with Shoshone Indians, the brothers find themselves fleeing into the wilderness. As they evade pursuing warriors, Abel and Henry must rely on their bond of brotherhood to survive and escape their fate.

programme.title: Texas, Adios
programme.desc: A Texas sheriff and his younger brother travel across the Mexican border to confront the man who killed their father.

programme.title: The Reward's Yours... The Man's Mine
programme.desc: A group of killers seek out wanted gunman El Puro for the $10,000 dollar reward.

programme.title: $1,000 on the Black
programme.desc: Twelve years ago, Sartana framed his brother Johnny for murder and stole his girlfriend. Now the town's undisputed boss and doted over by his possessive mother, Sartana seems safe - until, his sentence served, Johnny rides back into town.

programme.title: Life is Tough, Eh Providence
programme.desc: An eccentric bounty hunter named Providence captures and sets free a criminal in order to collect the same bounty over and over again in different states, until they discover that a local sheriff is up to something crooked.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: Sonic becomes aggravated that maybe their efforts of fighting for freedom seem pointless. Sonia suggests that they go to the Oracle for advice.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: The Hedgehogs congregate on the Floating Island in their latest effort to find their mother. But Sleet and Dingo also have an interest in this island.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: As Sonic begins to chow chili dogs for a snack, he finds a message in the sack from his mother urging him to head to Speedster Island.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A homecoming is interrupted for Sonic, Sonia and Manic when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes after returning to their birthplace.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea-beast.

programme.title: Sonic Underground
programme.desc: A group of Freedom Fighters is obliterated by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes looking for the insects, he is stung with serum.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: A female space hunter named Katella, who is capturing animals all over Mobius for a Zoo, teams up with Robotnik and captures Sonic. To Robotnik's great fear, she then plans to marry the eggman!

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Robotnik puts a meteor on a collision course with a village, Sonic is forced to compete in the Robolympics to save the village. After a series of wild, booby trapped events, Sonic is victorious.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: When Sonic decides to find Tails a suitable foster home, Robotnik finds out, and creates a robot fox family which poses as Tails' long lost parents. Sonic leaves Tails with the fox family, but finally realizes they're robots and rescues Tails.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Brandon Quark, an evil half-man, half-duck genius challenges, then teams up with Robotnik to capture Sonic. But Sonic knows their weakness, and pits the Badnik geniuses against one another, and sets himself free.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of
programme.desc: Momma Robotnik forces her son to run for President of Mobius with Wes Weasley as his campaign manager.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Madame Bovary
programme.desc: Based on the French literary classic, this drama presents author Gustave Flaubert (James Mason) narrating his tale of infidelity and narcissism. After marrying small-town doctor Charles Bovary (Van Heflin), Emma (Jennifer Jones) becomes tired of her limited social status and begins to have affairs, first with the young Leon Dupuis (Christopher Kent) and later with the wealthy Rodolphe Boulanger (Louis Jourdan). Eventually, however, her self-involved behavior catches up with her.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn, a high-school track star, scholar and aspiring rapper, learns that his girlfriend is sick. He soon plans to give her a life's worth of experiences in the last year she has left, and what he receives in return will last him a lifetime.

programme.title: Auntie Mame
programme.desc: Mame Dennis (Rosalind Russell), a progressive and independent woman of the 1920s, is left to care for her nephew Patrick (Jan Handzlik/Roger Smith) after his wealthy father dies. Mr. Babcock (Fred Clark), Patrick's assigned executor, objects to Mame's unconventional way of living and tries to force her to send Patrick to prep school. As Mame and Patrick grow closer, Mr. Babcock tries to discipline Patrick and threatens to separate the two if Mame does not comply with his wishes.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: When his boss is killed, Detroit cop Alex Foley (Eddie Murphy) finds evidence that the murderer had ties to a California amusement park called Wonder World. Returning to Beverly Hills once more, Foley reunites with Detective Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) to solve the case. Along with Billy's new partner, Jon Flint (Héctor Elizondo), they discover that the security force of Wonder World is actually part of a counterfeit money operation headed by park manager Orrin Sanderson (John Saxon).

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: A tough cop (Jason Statham) goes after a serial killer who targets police officers.

programme.title: Sergeant York
programme.desc: Prize-winning Tennessee marksman Alvin York (Gary Cooper), a recent convert to Christianity, finds himself torn between his non-violent beliefs and his desire to serve his country when recruited to fight in World War I. Kindly Major Buxton (Stanley Ridges) convinces York to engage in battle, where the pacifist's prowess with a rifle earns him honors as he continues to struggle with his decision to kill. Howard Hawks directs this adaptation of the real York's memoirs.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Charming scoundrel Johnnie Aysgarth (Cary Grant) woos wealthy but plain Lina McLaidlaw (Joan Fontaine), who runs away with him despite the warnings of her disapproving father (Cedric Hardwicke). After their marriage, Johnnie's risky financial ventures cause Lina to suspect he's becoming involved in unscrupulous dealings. When his dear friend and business partner, Beaky (Nigel Bruce), dies under suspicious circumstances on a business trip, she fears her husband might kill her for her inheritance.

programme.title: Dodge City
programme.desc: In 1872, Dodge City, Kansas is the epicenter of cattle drives and lawlessness. Run by Jeff Surrett (Bruce Cabot), Dodge City isn't safe for anyone or anything. When Wade Hatton (Errol Flynn) arrives for a cattle drive, he's moved by the violent death of a young boy to take up the post of sheriff and take back the town from Surrett and his cohorts. But first he must contend with the rowdy townsfolk who, having been so long without law, desire to take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: The First King
programme.desc: Two brothers working as shepherds embark on a journey that leads them to found a nation.

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: "Meet Me in St. Louis" is a classic MGM romantic musical comedy that focuses on four sisters (one of whom is the nonpareil Judy Garland) on the cusp of the 1904 St. Louis World's Fair. The film spotlights the sisters' education in the ways of the world, which includes, but isn't limited to, learning about life and love, courtesy of the prototypical boy next door. In the end, love -- accompanied by song, dance and period costumes, all in glorious Technicolor -- conquers all.

programme.title: Burn
programme.desc: Melinda is a lonely and unstable gas-station attendant who's tired of being overshadowed by her more confident and outgoing co-worker. When a robber holds up the station at gunpoint, Melinda tries to make a connection with the desperate thief.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Blitz
programme.desc: A tough cop (Jason Statham) goes after a serial killer who targets police officers.

programme.title: Sergeant York
programme.desc: Prize-winning Tennessee marksman Alvin York (Gary Cooper), a recent convert to Christianity, finds himself torn between his non-violent beliefs and his desire to serve his country when recruited to fight in World War I. Kindly Major Buxton (Stanley Ridges) convinces York to engage in battle, where the pacifist's prowess with a rifle earns him honors as he continues to struggle with his decision to kill. Howard Hawks directs this adaptation of the real York's memoirs.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Charming scoundrel Johnnie Aysgarth (Cary Grant) woos wealthy but plain Lina McLaidlaw (Joan Fontaine), who runs away with him despite the warnings of her disapproving father (Cedric Hardwicke). After their marriage, Johnnie's risky financial ventures cause Lina to suspect he's becoming involved in unscrupulous dealings. When his dear friend and business partner, Beaky (Nigel Bruce), dies under suspicious circumstances on a business trip, she fears her husband might kill her for her inheritance.

programme.title: Dodge City
programme.desc: In 1872, Dodge City, Kansas is the epicenter of cattle drives and lawlessness. Run by Jeff Surrett (Bruce Cabot), Dodge City isn't safe for anyone or anything. When Wade Hatton (Errol Flynn) arrives for a cattle drive, he's moved by the violent death of a young boy to take up the post of sheriff and take back the town from Surrett and his cohorts. But first he must contend with the rowdy townsfolk who, having been so long without law, desire to take the law into their own hands.

programme.title: San Antonio
programme.desc: Rancher Clay Hardin (Errol Flynn) has discovered that local saloon owner Roy Stuart (Paul Kelly) is selling cattle that doesn't belong to him, including some of Clay's own stolen stock. Armed with a tally book that proves it, Hardin now finds himself the target of Stuart's posse of gunslingers, who will stop at nothing to prevent Hardin from delivering the evidence to the proper authorities. With no one to help him except a few of his friends, Hardin has to fight for his cattle, and his life.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: A woman reports on corrupt officers.

programme.title: Fort Apache
programme.desc: When arrogant and stubborn Civil War hero Lieutenant Colonel Owen Thursday (Henry Fonda) arrives in Arizona with his daughter, Philadelphia (Shirley Temple), to assume command of the Fort Apache outpost, he clashes with level-headed Captain Kirby York (John Wayne). Viewing the local Native Americans through an ignorantly negative lens, Thursday is determined to engage them in battle for his own glory, despite the warnings of York -- an act of folly that will have dire consequences.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: The rivalry between two bounty hunters intensifies as they both attempt to track down a destructive device known as the "Hand of God."

programme.title: Butterfield 8
programme.desc: A Manhattan call girl (Elizabeth Taylor) has a tragic affair with a rich married man (Laurence Harvey).

programme.title: The Time Machine
programme.desc: H.G. Wells' time traveler journeys through time, experiencing several civilizations. Oscar-winning special effects.

programme.title: Europe Raiders

programme.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
programme.desc: Tennessee Williams' Blanche DuBois (Vivien Leigh) moves in with her sister, Stella (Kim Hunter), and brutish brother-in-law, Stanley Kowalski (Marlon Brando).

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: Tragedy follows when a new-to-town, troublemaking teen meets other anguished children of feckless parents.

programme.title: A Bad Idea Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Two would-be thieves forge a surprising relationship with a housesitter when they accidentally trap themselves in a house they just broke into.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A spoof of the turmoil that afflicted the movie industry in the late 1920s when movies went from silent to sound. When two silent movie stars', Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont, latest movie is made into a musical a chorus girl is brought in to dub Lina's speaking and singing. Don is on top of the world until Lina finds out.

programme.title: Butterfield 8
programme.desc: A Manhattan call girl (Elizabeth Taylor) has a tragic affair with a rich married man (Laurence Harvey).

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El Tigre Verón
programme.desc: El Tigre Verón, a union leader from the meat industry, must risk everything against his enemies from the bosses' world and justice.

programme.title: Mutiny on the Bounty
programme.desc: On a sea voyage to transport breadfruit to Jamaica, English Captain Bligh (Trevor Howard) abuses his crew and officers enough to anger his 1st Lieutenant, Fletcher Christian (Marlon Brando). When they reach their destination, tensions ease and the crew luxuriates in island life until Bligh claps several men in irons for trying to desert. On the trip home, further indignities inspire Christian to stage a mutiny and set Bligh and those loyal to him afloat in a row boat.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: Hollywood One on One
programme.desc: Hollywood celebrities give insight into their personal and professional lives, and open up about upcoming projects.

programme.title: A Streetcar Named Desire
programme.desc: Based on the play by Tennessee Williams, this renowned drama follows troubled former schoolteacher Blanche DuBois (Vivien Leigh) as she leaves small-town Mississippi and moves in with her sister, Stella Kowalski (Kim Hunter), and her husband, Stanley (Marlon Brando), in New Orleans. Blanche's flirtatious Southern-belle presence causes problems for Stella and Stanley, who already have a volatile relationship, leading to even greater conflict in the Kowalski household.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: After moving to a new town, troublemaking teen Jim Stark (James Dean) is supposed to have a clean slate, although being the new kid in town brings its own problems. While searching for some stability, Stark forms a bond with a disturbed classmate, Plato (Sal Mineo), and falls for local girl Judy (Natalie Wood). However, Judy is the girlfriend of neighborhood tough, Buzz (Corey Allen). When Buzz violently confronts Jim and challenges him to a drag race, the new kid's real troubles begin.

programme.title: A Bad Idea Gone Wrong
programme.desc: Two would-be thieves forge a surprising relationship with a housesitter when they accidentally trap themselves in a house they just broke into.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: A spoof of the turmoil that afflicted the movie industry in the late 1920s when movies went from silent to sound. When two silent movie stars', Don Lockwood and Lina Lamont, latest movie is made into a musical a chorus girl is brought in to dub Lina's speaking and singing. Don is on top of the world until Lina finds out.

programme.title: On the Line
programme.desc: A former detective falls victim to a phone scam. He infiltrates the phishing organization and meets the mastermind behind the crime.

programme.title: An Acceptable Loss
programme.desc: Libby Lamm is a former top national security adviser who, while working with a ruthless, steely-willed political veteran, signed off on a controversial military action that was supposed to end the war on terror. The problem: thousands died under false pretenses. Haunted by what she knows, Libby sets out to tell the truth, risking treason -- and her own life -- to expose a cover-up that stretches all the way to the top.

programme.title: Never So Few
programme.desc: Capt. Tom Reynolds (Frank Sinatra) is the leader of a U.S. military intelligence group stationed in Burma, training Kachin revolutionary troops to fight against encroaching Japanese forces during World War II. Tom leaves on another mission, and when he returns, he discovers that his camp has been overrun by Chinese guerrillas who have killed many of his American and Kachin friends. Enraged, Tom leads an unauthorized mission into China to search for the men who killed his fellow soldiers.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is hurtling toward Earth and could mean the end of all human life. The U.S. government keeps the crisis under wraps, but crack reporter Jenny Lerner (Tea Leoni) uncovers the truth -- forcing U.S. President Beck (Morgan Freeman) to announce his plan. Grizzled astronaut Spurgeon "Fish" Tanner (Robert Duvall) and his team will land on the comet and lay explosives, hopefully deterring the object from its doomsday course. If not, humanity will have to prepare for the worst.

programme.title: El lobista
programme.desc: Matías Franco is a lobbyist, manager of interests who works for individuals, companies and corporations. He is dedicated to pressuring his contacts in power to do business with his clients.

programme.title: El Tigre Verón
programme.desc: El Tigre Verón, a union leader from the meat industry, must risk everything against his enemies from the bosses' world and justice.

When they reach their destination, tensions ease and the crew luxuriates in island life until Bligh claps several men in irons for trying to desert. On the trip home, further indignities inspire Christian to stage a mutiny and set Bligh and those loyal to him afloat in a row boat.

programme.title: The Last Shift
programme.desc: Calling it quits after 38 years, an aging fast-food worker trains his young replacement on the graveyard shift at Oscar's Chicken and Fish.

Tom Reynolds (Frank Sinatra) is the leader of a U.S. military intelligence group stationed in Burma, training Kachin revolutionary troops to fight against encroaching Japanese forces during World War II. Enraged, Tom leads an unauthorized mission into China to search for the men who killed his fellow soldiers.

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: A comet is hurtling toward Earth and could mean the end of all human life. The U.S. government keeps the crisis under wraps, but crack reporter Jenny Lerner (Tea Leoni) uncovers the truth -- forcing U.S. President Beck (Morgan Freeman) to announce his plan. Grizzled astronaut Spurgeon "Fish" Tanner (Robert Duvall) and his team will land on the comet and lay explosives, hopefully deterring the object from its doomsday course. If not, humanity will have to prepare for the worst.

programme.title: Scaramouche
programme.desc: When the wicked Marquis de Maynes (Mel Ferrer) kills Andre Moreau's (Stewart Granger) best friend in a sword fighting duel and steals his love, Aline (Janet Leigh), the Frenchman vows revenge. While hiding out with a theatrical troupe and posing as the clown Scaramouche, Moreau works with the Marquis' very own fencing instructor to hone his skill with the sword. Once he feels he's up to task, he returns to the city to claim his revenge and win back Aline.

programme.title: High Society
programme.desc: Jazz artist C.K. Dexter Haven (Bing Crosby) is still hung up on his ex-wife and neighbor, socialite Tracy Samantha Lord (Grace Kelly), however Tracy is engaged to another man (John Lund). Matters are complicated even further when a magazine reporter (Frank Sinatra), in town to cover Tracy's wedding, also winds up falling for the beautiful bride-to-be. As Tracy tries to decide on the ideal husband, each suitor works hard to convince her he is the best choice.

programme.title: The Imitation Game
programme.desc: In 1939, newly created British intelligence agency MI6 recruits Cambridge mathematics alumnus Alan Turing (Benedict Cumberbatch) to crack Nazi codes, including Enigma -- which cryptanalysts had thought unbreakable. Turing's team, including Joan Clarke (Keira Knightley), analyze Enigma messages while he builds a machine to decipher them. Turing and team finally succeed and become heroes, but in 1952, the quiet genius encounters disgrace when authorities reveal he is gay and send him to prison.

programme.title: The Harvey Girls
programme.desc: When Susan Bradley (Judy Garland) responded to an ad in New Mexico for a mail-order bride, she had no idea that her would-be husband was a broken-down cowhand. Instead of returning back home, she takes a job at the local Harvey House restaurant. But the new establishment faces tough resistance from the local saloon owner (John Hodiak) and the town's streetwise showgirl, Em (Angela Lansbury). As Susan works with the Harvey girls to win over the townsfolk, she also searches for a new love.

programme.desc: Out to strengthen her bid to reach the WTA Finals, Elena Rybakina targets WTA 500 glory in the Ningbo final as the world number nine meets fellow top-10 star Ekaterina Alexandrova.

programme.title: Tennis: ATP & WTA Miami Open 2025
programme.desc: In Miami, the women's final get underway as top seed Aryna Sabalenka meets with home favourite Jessica Pegula in a repeat of last year's US Open decider.

programme.title: Tennis: WTA San Diego Open 2024
programme.desc: British number one Katie Boulter looks to win her first WTA 500 title as she takes on Marta Kostyuk in the final of the San Diego Open. Kostyuk knocked out the top seed to get here. (03.03)
